# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-104">중요한 정보 유형 엔터티 정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-105">준수 센터의 DLP (데이터 손실 방지)에는 DLP 정책에서 사용할 수 있는 중요 한 정보 유형이 많이 포함 되어 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready for you to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-106">이 항목에서는 이러한 모든 중요한 정보 유형의 목록과 DLP 정책이 이러한 각 유형을 검색할 때 찾는 내용을 보여 줍니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-106">This topic lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-107">중요한 정보 유형은 정규식이나 함수로 식별될 수 있는 패턴으로 정의됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-108">또한 키워드 및 체크섬과 같은 확증적인 증거를 사용하여 중요한 정보 유형을 식별할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-108">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-109">이러한 평가 프로세스에서 신뢰 수준 및 근접성도 사용됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-110">중요 한 정보 유형에는 다음 구독 중 하나가 필요 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-110">Sensitive information types require one of these subscriptions:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-113">ABA 라우팅 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-113">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-114">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-114">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-115">서식이 지정 되거나 서식 없는 패턴으로 표시 될 수 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-115">nine digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-116">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-116">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-117">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-117">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-118">0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작 하는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-118">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-119">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-119">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-120">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-120">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-121">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-121">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-122">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-122">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-123">서식 없음: 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7 또는 8로 시작 하는 연속 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-123">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-124">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-124">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-125">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-125">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-126">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-126">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-127">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-127">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-128">Func_aba_routing 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-128">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-129">Keyword_ABA_Routing의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-129">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- ABA Routing Number -->
<Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-149">아르헨티나 국가 id (DNI) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-149">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-150">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-151">마침표로 구분된 8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-151">Eight digits separated by periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-152">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-153">8자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-153">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-154">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-154">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-155">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-155">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-156">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-156">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-157">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-157">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-158">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-158">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-159">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-159">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-160">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-160">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-161">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-161">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-162">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-162">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-163">정규식 Regex_argentina_national_id 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-163">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-164">Keyword_argentina_national_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-164">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-165">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-165">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_argentina_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-166">Keyword_argentina_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-166">Keyword_argentina_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-169">식별 국가 Id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-169">Identification National Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-170">DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-170">DNI</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-171">개인의 NIC 국내 레지스트리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-171">NIC National Registry of Persons</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-172">Documento Nacional de Identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-172">Documento Nacional de Identidad</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-174">Identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-174">Identidad</span></span>

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-176">오스트레일리아 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-176">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-177">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-177">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-178">뱅크 상태 분기 번호 유무에 관계 없이 6 ~ twn 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-178">six to twn digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-179">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-179">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-180">계정 번호는 6 ~ 10 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-180">Account number is six to ten digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-181">호주 은행 지점 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-181">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-182">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-182">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-183">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-183">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-184">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-184">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-185">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-185">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-186">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-186">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-187">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-187">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-188">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-188">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-189">Regex_australia_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-189">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-190">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-190">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-191">Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-191">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-192">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-192">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-193">Regex_australia_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-193">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-194">Keyword_australia_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-194">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-211">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-211">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-212">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-212">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-214">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-214">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-215">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-215">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-216">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-216">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-217">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-217">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-218">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-218">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-219">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-219">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-220">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-220">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-221">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-221">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-222">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-222">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-223">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-223">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-224">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-224">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-225">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-225">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-226">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-226">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-227">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-227">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-228">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-228">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-229">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-229">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-230">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-230">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-231">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-231">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-232">Func_australian_business_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-232">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-233">Keywords_australian_business_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-233">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-234">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-234">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-235">Func_australian_business_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-235">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-250">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-250">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-251">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-251">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-252">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-252">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-253">구분 기호가 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-253">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-254">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-254">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-255">구분 기호가 있는 9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-255">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-256">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-256">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-257">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-257">a space</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-259">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-259">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-260">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-260">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-261">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-261">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-262">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-262">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-263">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-263">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-264">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-264">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-265">Func_Australian_Company_Number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-265">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-266">Keyword_Australian_Company_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-266">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-267">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-267">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-268">Func_Australian_Company_Number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-268">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-278">오스트레일리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-278">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-279">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-279">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-280">9 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-280">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-281">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-281">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-282">9 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-282">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-283">2 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-283">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-284">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-284">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-285">5 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-285">five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-286">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-286">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-287">1 ~ 2 개의 선택적 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-287">one to two optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-288">4 ~ 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-288">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-289">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-289">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-290">9 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-290">nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-291">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-292">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-292">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-293">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-294">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-294">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-295">Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-295">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-296">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-296">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-297">Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-297">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-397">오스트레일리아 의료 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-397">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-398">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-398">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-399">10-11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-399">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-400">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-400">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-401">10-11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-401">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-402">첫 번째 숫자는 2-6 범위에 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-402">first digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-403">9 번째 숫자는 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-403">ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-404">10 번째 숫자는 문제 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-404">tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-405">11 번째 숫자 (선택 사항)는 개별 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-405">eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-406">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-406">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-407">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-407">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-408">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-408">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-409">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-409">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-410">Func_australian_medical_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-410">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-411">Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-411">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-412">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-412">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-413">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-413">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-424">오스트레일리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-424">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-425">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-426">문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-426">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-427">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-427">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-428">1개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-428">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-429">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-429">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-430">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-430">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-431">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-431">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-432">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-432">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-433">Regex_australia_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-433">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-434">Keyword_passport 또는 Keyword_australia_passport_number의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-434">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-468">오스트레일리아 세금 파일 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-468">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-469">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-469">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-470">8 ~ 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-470">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-471">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-471">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-472">일반적으로 다음과 같이 공백을 사용 하 여 표시 되는 8 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-472">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-473">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-473">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-474">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-474">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-475">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-475">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-476">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-476">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-477">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-477">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-478">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-478">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-479">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-479">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-480">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-480">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-481">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-481">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-482">Func_australian_tax_file_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-482">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-483">Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 또는 Keyword_number_exclusions의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-483">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-484">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-484">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-485">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-485">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-486">Keyword_australia_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-486">Keyword_australia_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-487">australian business number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-487">australian business number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-488">marginal tax rate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-488">marginal tax rate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-489">medicare levy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-489">medicare levy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-490">portfolio number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-490">portfolio number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-493">individual tax return</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-493">individual tax return</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-494">tax file number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-494">tax file number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-495">tfn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-495">tfn</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-496">오스트리아 드라이버의 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-496">Austria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-497">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-497">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-498">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-498">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-499">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-499">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-500">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-500">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-501">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-501">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-502">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-502">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-503">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-503">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-504">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-504">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-505">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-505">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-506">정규식이 해당  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-506">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-507">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-507">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-508">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-508">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-509">Keywords_austria_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-509">Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-510">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-510">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-511">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-511">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-512">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-512">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-513">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-513">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-514">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-514">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-515">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-515">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-516">driver's licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-516">driver's licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-517">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-517">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-518">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-518">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-519">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-519">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-520">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-520">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-521">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-521">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-522">fuhrerschein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-522">fuhrerschein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-523">fuhrerschein republik osterreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-523">fuhrerschein republik osterreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-524">오스트리아 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-524">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-525">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-525">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-526">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-526">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-527">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-527">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-528">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-528">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-529">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-529">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-530">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-530">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-531">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-531">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-532">문자, 숫자 및 특수 문자의 24 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-532">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-533">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-533">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-534">24 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-534">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-535">22 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시 또는 더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-535">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-536">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자, 백슬래시, 슬래시, 더하기 기호 또는 등호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-536">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-537">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-537">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-538">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-538">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-539">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-539">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-540">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-540">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-541">정규식이 해당  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-541">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-542">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-542">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-543">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-543">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-544">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-544">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-545">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-545">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-546">
national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-546">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-547">personalausweis republik österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-547">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-548">오스트리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-548">Austria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-549">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 sensitiveinformation type 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-549">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitiveinformation type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-550">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-550">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-551">1 개의 문자 다음에 선택적 공백, 일곱 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-551">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-552">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-552">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-553">한 글자, 일곱 자리 및 한 가지 공백 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-553">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-554">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-554">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-555">1 개의 공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-555">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-556">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-556">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-557">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-557">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-558">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-558">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-559">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-559">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-560">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-560">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-561">정규식이 해당  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-561">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-562">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-562">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-572">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-572">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-573">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-573">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-574">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-574">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-575">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-575">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-577">reisepasse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-577">reisepasse</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-579">Veiligheid-Reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-579">Nr-Reisepass</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-580">Reisepass-Veiligheid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-580">Reisepass-Nr</span></span>

## <a name="austria-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-583">오스트리아 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-583">Austria social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-584">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-584">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-585">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-585">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-586">지정 된 형식의 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-586">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-587">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-587">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-588">10자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-588">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-589">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-589">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-590">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-590">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-591">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-591">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-592">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-592">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-593">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-593">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-594">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-594">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-595">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-595">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-596">함수 ' Func_austria_eu_</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-596">The function  \`Func_austria_eu_</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-597">_or_equivalent '는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-597">_or_equivalent\` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-598">from 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-598">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-599">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-599">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-600">이 함수는 해당  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-600">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-601">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-601">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-602">Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-602">Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-603">소셜 보안 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-603">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-604">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-604">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-605">social security code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-605">social security code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-606">보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-606">insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-607">오스트리아</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-607">austrian ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-608">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-608">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-609">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-609">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-610">보험 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-610">insurance code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-611">보험 코드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-611">insurance code#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-612">사회 alsecurityno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-612">socialsecurityno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-613">sozialversicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-613">sozialversicherungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-614">soziale sicherheit kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-614">soziale sicherheit kein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-615">versicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-615">versicherungsnummer</span></span>

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-616">오스트리아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-616">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-617">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-617">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-618">하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-618">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-619">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-619">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-620">하이픈 및 슬래시가 있는 9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-620">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-621">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-621">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-622">하이픈 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-622">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-623">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-623">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-624">슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-624">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-625">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-625">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-626">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-626">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-627">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-627">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-628">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-628">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-629">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-629">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-630">이 함수는 해당  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-630">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-631">From 키워드를  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-631">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-632">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-632">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-633">이 함수는 해당  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-633">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-656">오스트리아 값 추가 된 세금</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-656">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-657">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-657">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-658">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-658">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-659">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-659">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-660">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-660">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-661">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-661">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-662">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-662">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-663">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-663">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-664">11 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-664">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-665">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-665">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-666">11 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-666">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-667">A 또는 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-667">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-668">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-668">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-669">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-669">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-670">U 또는 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-670">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-671">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-671">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-672">2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-672">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-673">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-673">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-674">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-674">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-675">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-675">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-676">1 ~ 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-676">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-677">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-677">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-678">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-678">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-679">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-679">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-680">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-680">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-681">Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-681">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-682">Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-682">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-683">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-683">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-684">Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-684">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-689">오스트리아 vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-689">austrian vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-690">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-690">vat no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-691">vatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-691">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-692">값이 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-692">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-693">오스트리아-vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-693">austrian vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-694">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-694">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-695">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-695">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-696">mwstnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-696">mwstnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-697">ust.-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-697">ust.-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-698">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-698">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-699">vat 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-699">vat identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-700">atu 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-700">atu number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-701">uid 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-701">uid number</span></span>


## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-702">Azure DocumentDB 인증 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-702">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-703">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-703">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-704">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 "DocumentDb" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-704">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-705">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-705">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-706">"DocumentDb" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-706">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-707">3-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-707">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-708">보다 큼 기호 (>), 등호 (=), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-708">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-709">86의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-709">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-710">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-710">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-711">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-711">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-712">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-712">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-713">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-713">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-714">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-714">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-715">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-715">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-716">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-716">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-717">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-717">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-723">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-723">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-724">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-724">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-725">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-725">localhost</span></span>
