## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-731">Azure IAAS 데이터베이스 연결 문자열 및 Azure SQL 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-731">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-732">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-732">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-733">"Server", "server" 또는 "data source" 라는 문자열은 "cloudapp. azure"를 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 따릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-733">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-734">com "또는" cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-734">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-735">net "또는" 데이터베이스.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-735">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-736">net "과 문자열" Password "또는" password "또는" pwd "가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-736">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-737">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-737">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-738">문자열 "Server", "Server" 또는 "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-738">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-739">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-739">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-740">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-740">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-741">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-741">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-742">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-742">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-743">문자열 "cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-743">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-744">com "," cloudapp.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-744">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-745">net "또는" database.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-745">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-746">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-746">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-747">1-300에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-747">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-748">문자열 "Password", "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-748">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-749">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-749">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-750">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-750">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-751">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-751">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-752">세미콜론 (;), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')가 아닌 하나 이상의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-752">one or more characters that is not a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-753">세미콜론 (;), 따옴표 (") 또는 아포스트로피 (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-753">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-754">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-754">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-755">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-755">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-756">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-756">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-757">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-757">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-758">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-758">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-759">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-759">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-760">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-760">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-761">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-761">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-762">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-762">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-763">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-763">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-764">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-764">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-765">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-765">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-766">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-766">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-767">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-767">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-768">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-768">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-769">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-769">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-770">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-770">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-771">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-771">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-772">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-772">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-773">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-773">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-774">Azure IoT connection 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-774">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-775">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-775">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-776">문자열 "HostName" 뒤에 "azure-devices" 라는 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 표시 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-776">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-777">net "및" SharedAccessKey "</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-777">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-778">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-778">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-779">문자열 "HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-779">the string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-780">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-780">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-781">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-781">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-782">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-782">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-783">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-783">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-784">문자열 "azure-장치</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-784">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-785">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-785">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-786">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-786">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-787">"SharedAccessKey" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-787">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-788">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-788">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-789">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-789">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-790">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-790">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-791">43의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-791">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-792">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-792">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-793">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-793">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-794">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-794">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-795">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-795">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-796">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-796">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-797">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-797">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-798">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-798">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-799">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-799">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-801">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-801">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-802">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-802">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-803">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-803">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-804">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-804">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-805">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-805">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-806">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-806">onebox</span></span>

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-813">Azure 게시 설정 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-813">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-814">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-814">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-815">문자열 "userpwd =" 다음에 영숫자 문자열이 나옵니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-815">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-816">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-816">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-817">문자열 "userpwd ="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-817">the string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-818">60 대 문자와 숫자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-818">any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-819">큰따옴표 (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-819">a quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-820">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-820">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-821">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-821">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-822">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-822">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-823">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-823">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-824">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-824">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-825">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-825">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-826">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-826">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-833">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-833">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-834">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-834">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-835">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-835">127.0.0.1</span></span>

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-840">Azure Redis 캐시 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-840">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-841">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-841">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-842">문자열 "redis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-842">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-843">net "문자열" password "또는" pwd "를 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-843">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-844">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-844">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-845">문자열 "redis.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-845">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-846">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-846">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-847">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-847">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-848">문자열 "password" 또는 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-848">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-849">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-849">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-850">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-850">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-851">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-851">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-852">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 43 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-852">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-853">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-853">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-854">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-854">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-855">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-855">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-856">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-856">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-857">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-857">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-858">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-858">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-859">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-859">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-867">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-867">onebox</span></span>

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-874">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-874">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-875">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-875">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-876">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-876">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-877">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-877">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-878">문자열 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-878">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-879">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-879">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-880">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-880">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-881">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-881">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-882">대/소문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호 (%)가 43-53 자 사이의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-882">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-883">문자열 "% 3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-883">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-884">소문자 또는 대문자, 숫자 또는 백분율 기호 (%)가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-884">any character that is not a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-885">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-885">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-886">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-886">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-887">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-887">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-888">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-888">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-889">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-889">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-890">Azure service bus 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-890">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-891">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-891">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-892">문자열 "끝점" 뒤에 "servicebus" 라는 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 나와 있는 문자 및 문자열이 표시 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-892">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-893">net "및" SharedAccesKey "을 차례로 누릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-893">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-894">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-894">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-895">문자열 "끝점"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-895">the string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-896">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-896">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-897">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-897">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-898">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-898">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-899">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-899">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-900">문자열 "servicebus.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-900">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-901">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-901">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-902">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-902">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-903">"SharedAccessKey" 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-903">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-904">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-904">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-905">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-905">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-906">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-906">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-907">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 43 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-907">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-908">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-908">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-909">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-909">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-910">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-910">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-911">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-911">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-912">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-912">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-913">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-913">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-914">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-914">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-922">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-922">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-923">로컬</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-923">localhost</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-929">Azure 저장소 계정 키</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-929">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-930">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-930">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-931">"DefaultEndpointsProtocol" 문자열은 "AccountKey" 문자열을 포함 하 여 아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열을 따릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-931">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-932">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-932">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-933">문자열 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-933">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-934">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-934">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-935">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-935">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-936">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-936">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-937">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-937">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-938">문자열 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-938">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-939">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-939">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-940">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-940">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-941">0 ~ 2 개의 공백 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-941">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-942">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 86 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-942">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-943">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-943">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-944">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-945">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-945">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-946">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-947">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-947">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-948">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-948">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-949">정규식 CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-949">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-950">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-950">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-951">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-951">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_common_example_keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-955">CEP_common_example_keywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-955">CEP_common_example_keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-956">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-956">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-957">극동</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-957">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-958">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-958">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-959">대양</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-959">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-960">샌드박스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-960">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-961">용 onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-961">onebox</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-966">s-int</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-966">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-967">투자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-967">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-968">Azure 저장소 계정 키 (일반)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-968">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-969">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-969">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-970">아래 패턴에 윤곽선이 있는 문자 앞 이나 뒤에 오는 86 문자의 대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)의 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-970">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-971">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-971">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-972">0은 보다 큼 기호 (>), 아포스트로피 ('), 등호 (=), 따옴표 (") 또는 숫자 기호 (#) 중 하나입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-972">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-973">대/소문자, 숫자, 슬래시 (/) 또는 더하기 기호 (+)가 있는 86 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-973">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-974">두 개의 등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-974">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-975">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-975">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-976">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-976">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-977">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-977">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-978">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-978">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-979">정규식 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-979">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-980">벨기에 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-980">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-981">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-981">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-982">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-982">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-983">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-983">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-984">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-984">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-985">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-985">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-986">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-986">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-987">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-987">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-988">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-988">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-989">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-989">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-990">정규식이 해당  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-990">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-991">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-991">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1013">벨기에 국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1013">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1014">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1014">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1015">11 자리 숫자와 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1015">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1016">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1016">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1017">11자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1017">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1018">6 자리 숫자와 2 개의 선택적 마침표 (YY) 19. DD for 생년월일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1018">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1019">점, 대시, 공백 등의 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1019">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1020">3 개의 순차 숫자 (남성의의 경우 홀수, 여성의 경우 짝수의 경우에도)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1020">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1021">점, 대시, 공백 등의 선택적 구분 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1021">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1022">두 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1022">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1023">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1023">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1024">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1024">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1025">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1025">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1026">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1026">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1027">Func_belgium_national_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1027">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1028">Keyword_belgium_national_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1028">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1029">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1029">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1030">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1030">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1031">Func_belgium_national_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1031">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1032">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1032">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1091">벨기에 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1091">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1092">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1092">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1093">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1093">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1094">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 2 개 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자 사용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1094">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1095">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1095">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1096">2 개 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1096">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1097">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1097">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1098">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1098">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1099">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1099">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1100">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1100">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1101">정규식이 해당  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1101">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1102">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1102">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1126">벨기에 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1126">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1127">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1127">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1128">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1128">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1129">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1129">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1130">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1130">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1131">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1131">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1132">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1132">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1133">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1133">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1134">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1134">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1135">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1135">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1136">이 함수는 해당  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1136">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1137">From 키워드를  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1137">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1138">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1138">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1139">이 함수는 해당  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1139">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1159">벨기에 값 세금 번호 추가 됨</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1159">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1160">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1160">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1161">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1161">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1162">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1162">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1163">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1163">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1164">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1164">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1165">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1165">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1166">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1166">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1167">12 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1167">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1168">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1168">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1169">12 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1169">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1170">a 문자 B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1170">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1171">문자 E 또는 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1171">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1172">숫자 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1172">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1173">1부터 9 까지의 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1173">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1174">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1174">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1175">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1175">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1176">선택적 점 또는 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1176">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1177">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1177">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1178">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1178">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1179">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1179">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1180">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1180">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1181">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1181">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1182">Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1182">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1183">Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1183">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1184">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1184">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1185">Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1185">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1186">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1186">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1187">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1187">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1188">n º va</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1188">nº tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1189">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1189">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1190">vat 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1190">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1191">numéro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1191">numéro t.v.a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1192">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1192">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1193">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1193">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1194">btw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1194">btw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1195">btw #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1195">btw#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1196">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1196">vat#</span></span>


## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1197">브라질 CPF 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1197">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1198">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1198">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1199">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 검사 숫자를 포함하는 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1199">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1200">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1200">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1201">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1201">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1202">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1202">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1203">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1203">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1204">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1204">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1205">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1205">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1206">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1206">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1207">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1207">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1208">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1208">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1209">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1209">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1210">마지막 2자리 숫자가 검사 숫자인 11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1210">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1211">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1211">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1212">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1212">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1213">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1213">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1214">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1214">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1215">Func_brazil_cpf 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1215">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1216">Keyword_brazil_cpf에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1216">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1217">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1217">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1218">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1218">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1219">Func_brazil_cpf 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1219">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1220">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1221">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1221">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cpf"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1222">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1222">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1223">CPF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1223">CPF</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1224">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1224">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1225">등록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1225">Registration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1226">별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1226">Revenue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1227">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1227">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1228">Imposto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1228">Imposto</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1229">Identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1229">Identificação</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1230">Inscrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1230">Inscrição</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1231">고 eita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1231">Receita</span></span> 

   
## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1232">브라질 legal 엔티티 번호 (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1232">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1233">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1233">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1234">등록 번호, 지점 번호, 검사 숫자 및 구분 기호를 포함하는 14자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1234">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1235">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1235">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1236">14자리 숫자와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1236">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1237">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1237">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1238">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1238">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1239">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1239">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1240">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1240">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1241">3 자리 숫자 (처음 8 자리 숫자는 등록 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1241">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1242">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1242">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1243">4 자리 지점 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1243">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1244">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1244">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1245">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1245">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1246">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1246">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1247">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1247">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1248">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1248">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1249">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1249">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1250">Func_brazil_cnpj 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1250">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1251">Keyword_brazil_cnpj에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1251">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1252">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1252">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1253">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1253">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1254">Func_brazil_cnpj 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1254">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1255">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1255">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1262">Taxpayers Registry</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1262">Taxpayers Registry</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1265">Registration Status</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1265">Registration Status</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1266">Business</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1266">Business</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1267">Company</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1267">Company</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1270">Cadastro Geral de Contribuintes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1270">Cadastro Geral de Contribuintes</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1277">브라질 국립 식별 카드 (RG)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1277">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1278">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1278">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1279">Registro Geral (이전 형식): 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1279">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1280">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (새 형식): 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1280">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1281">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1281">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1282">Registro Geral(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1282">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1283">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1283">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1284">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1284">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1285">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1285">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1286">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1286">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1287">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1287">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1288">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1288">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1289">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1289">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1290">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1290">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1291">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1291">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1292">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1292">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1293">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1293">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1294">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1294">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1295">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1295">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1296">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1296">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1297">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1297">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1298">Func_brazil_rg 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1298">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1299">Keyword_brazil_rg에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1299">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1300">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1300">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1301">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1301">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1302">Func_brazil_rg 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1302">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1303">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1303">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1308">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1308">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1309">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1309">número de rregistro</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1314">불가리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1314">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1315">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1315">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1316">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1316">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1317">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1317">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1318">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1318">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1319">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1319">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1320">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1320">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1321">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1321">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1322">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1322">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1323">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1323">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1324">정규식이 해당  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1324">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1325">From 키워드를  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1325">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
             <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern> 
</Entity>    
```
