## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1344">불가리아 uniform 민사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1344">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1345">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1345">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1346">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1346">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1347">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1347">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1348">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1348">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1349">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1349">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1350">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1350">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1351">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1351">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1352">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1352">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1353">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1353">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1354">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1354">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1355">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1355">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1356">출생 순서에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1356">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1357">성별에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자와이에 해당 하는 짝수 자리 숫자 및 암의 홀수 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1357">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1358">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1358">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1359">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1359">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1360">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1360">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1361">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1361">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1362">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1362">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1363">이 함수는 해당  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1363">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1364">From 키워드를  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1364">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1365">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1365">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1366">이 함수는 해당  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1366">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1411">불가리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1411">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1412">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1412">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1413">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1413">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1414">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1414">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1415">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1415">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1416">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1416">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1417">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1417">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1418">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1418">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1419">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1419">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1420">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1420">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1421">정규식이 해당  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1421">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1422">From  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1422">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common`is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1423">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1423">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1425">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1425">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1426">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1426">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1427">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1427">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1428">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1428">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1429">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1429">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1430">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1430">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1431">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1431">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1432">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1432">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1433">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1433">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1434">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1434">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1435">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1435">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1436">номер на паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1436">номер на паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1437">номер на паспорт</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1437">номер на паспорт</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1438">паспорт 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1438">паспорт №</span></span>

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1439">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1439">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1440">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1440">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1441">7 또는 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1441">seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1442">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1442">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1443">캐나다 은행 계좌 번호는 7 또는 12자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1443">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1444">캐나다 은행 계좌 송금 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1444">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1445">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1445">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1446">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1446">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1447">3 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1447">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1448">제로 "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1448">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1449">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1449">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1450">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1450">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1451">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1451">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1452">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1452">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1453">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1453">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1454">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1454">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1455">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1455">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1456">Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1456">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1457">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1457">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1458">Regex_canada_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1458">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1459">Keyword_canada_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1459">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1483">캐나다 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1483">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1484">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1484">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1485">지역마다 다름</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1485">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1486">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1486">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1487">앨버타, 브리티시 콜롬비아, 매니토바, 뉴브런즈윅, 뉴펀들랜드/래브라도, 노바스코샤, 온타리오, 프린스에드워드아일랜드, 퀘벡 및 서스캐처원을 포함하는 다양한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1487">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1488">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1488">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1489">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1489">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1490">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1490">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1491">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1491">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1492">Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1492">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1493">Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1493">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1494">Keyword_canada_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1494">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1630">캐나다 건강 서비스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1630">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1631">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1631">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1632">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1632">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1633">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1633">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1634">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1634">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1635">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1635">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1636">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1636">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1637">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1637">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1638">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1638">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1639">Regex_canada_health_service_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1639">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1640">Keyword_canada_health_service_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1640">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1641">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1641">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1643">personal health number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1643">personal health number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1644">patient information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1644">patient information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1645">health services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1645">health services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1646">speciality services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1646">speciality services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1647">automobile accident</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1647">automobile accident</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1648">patient hospital</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1648">patient hospital</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1649">psychiatrist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1649">psychiatrist</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1650">workers compensation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1650">workers compensation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1651">종류</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1651">disability</span></span>

      
## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1652">캐나다 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1652">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1653">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1653">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1654">두 개의 대문자와 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1654">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1655">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1655">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1656">두 개의 대문자와 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1656">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1657">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1657">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1658">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1658">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1659">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1659">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1660">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1660">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1661">Regex_canada_passport_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1661">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1662">Keyword_canada_passport_number 또는 Keyword_passport의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1662">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1692">캐나다 PHIN (개인 건강 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1692">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1693">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1693">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1694">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1694">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1695">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1695">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1696">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1696">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1697">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1697">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1698">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1698">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1699">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1699">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1700">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1700">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1701">Regex_canada_phin 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1701">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1702">Keyword_canada_phin 또는 Keyword_canada_provinces에서 키워드가 두 개 이상 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1702">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1735">캐나다 사회 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1735">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1736">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1736">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1737">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백이 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1737">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1738">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1738">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1739">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1739">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1740">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1740">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1741">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1741">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1742">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1742">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1743">하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1743">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1744">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1744">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1745">서식 없음: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1745">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1746">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1746">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1747">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1747">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1748">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1748">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1749">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1749">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1750">Func_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1750">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1751">2개 이상의 다음 항목 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1751">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1752">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1752">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1753">Keyword_sin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1753">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1754">Func_eu_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1754">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1755">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1755">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1756">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1756">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1757">Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1757">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1758">Keyword_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1758">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1759">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1759">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1784">칠레 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1784">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1785">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1785">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1786">7 ~ 8 자리 숫자와 구분 기호, 검사 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1786">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1787">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1787">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1788">7 ~ 8 자리와 구분 기호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1788">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1789">1 ~ 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1789">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1790">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1790">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1791">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1791">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1792">마침표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1792">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1793">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1793">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1794">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1794">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1795">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1795">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1796">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1796">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1797">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1797">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1798">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1798">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1799">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1799">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1800">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1800">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1801">Keyword_chile_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1801">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1802">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1802">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1803">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1804">Func_chile_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1804">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1805">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1805">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1806">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1806">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_chile_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1807">Keyword_chile_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1807">Keyword_chile_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1808">National Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1808">National Identification Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1809">Identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1809">Identity card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1810">ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1810">ID</span></span>

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1820">중국의 중국 id 카드 (PRC) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1820">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1821">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1821">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1822">18자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1822">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1823">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1823">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1824">18자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1824">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1825">주소 코드에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1825">six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1826">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYYYMMDD 형식의 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1826">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1827">주문 코드에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1827">three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1828">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1828">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1829">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1829">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1830">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1830">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1831">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1831">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1832">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1832">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1833">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1833">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1834">Keyword_china_resident_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1834">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1835">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1835">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1836">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1836">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1837">Func_china_resident_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1837">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1838">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1838">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1839">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1839">Keywords</span></span>

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1840">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1840">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1841">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1841">Resident Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1842">중국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1842">PRC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1843">National Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1843">National Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1844">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1844">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1845">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1845">居民 身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1846">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1846">居民身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1847">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1847">鉴定</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1848">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1848">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1849">居民 身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1849">居民 身份證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1850">鑑定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1850">鑑定</span></span> 

   
## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1851">신용 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1851">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1852">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1852">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1853">서식이 있거나 서식이 없을 수 있는 (dddddddddddddddd), Luhn 테스트를 통과 해야 하는 16 자리 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1853">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1854">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1854">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1855">Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, 상품권 및 식사권을 비롯하여 전 세계 모든 주요 브랜드 카드를 검색하는 매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1855">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1856">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1856">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1857">있음(Luhn 체크섬)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1857">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1858">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1858">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1859">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1859">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1860">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1860">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1861">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1861">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1862">Keyword_cc_verification의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1862">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1863">Keyword_cc_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1863">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1864">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1864">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1865">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1865">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1866">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1866">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1867">Func_credit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1867">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-1868">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-1868">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2128">크로아티아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2128">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2129">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2129">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2130">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2130">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2131">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2131">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2132">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2132">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2133">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2133">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2134">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2134">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2135">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2135">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2136">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2136">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2137">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2137">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2138">정규식이 해당  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2138">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2139">From 키워드를  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2139">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2145">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2145">driver licence</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2155">크로아티아 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2155">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2156">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 국가 식별 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2156">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2157">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2157">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2158">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2158">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2159">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2159">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2160">9 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2160">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2161">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2161">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2162">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2162">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2163">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2163">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2164">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2164">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2165">Func_croatia_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2165">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2166">Keyword_croatia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2166">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2197">크로아티아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2197">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2198">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2198">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2199">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2199">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2200">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2200">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2201">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2201">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2202">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2202">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2203">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2203">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2204">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2204">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2205">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2205">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2206">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2206">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2207">정규식이 해당  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2207">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2208">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2208">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2211">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2211">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2212">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2212">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2213">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2213">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2214">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2214">passports</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2219">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2219">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2220">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2220">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2221">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2221">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2222">broj putovnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2222">broj putovnice</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2223">br.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2223">br.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2224">Putovnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2224">Putovnice</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2225">br putovnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2225">br putovnice</span></span>
   
## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2226">크로아티아 OIB (개인 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2226">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2227">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2228">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2228">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2229">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2230">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2230">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2231">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2231">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2232">최종 숫자가 검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2232">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2233">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2233">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2234">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2234">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2235">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2235">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2236">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2236">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2237">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2237">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2238">Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2238">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2239">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2239">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2240">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2240">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2241">Func_croatia_oib_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2241">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2242">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2242">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2243">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2243">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2252">osobni id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2252">osobni id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2254">개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2254">personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2255">porezni broj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2255">porezni broj</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2256">porezni identifikacijski broj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2256">porezni identifikacijski broj</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2257">tax id</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2273">크로아티아 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 하는 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2273">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2274">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2274">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2275">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2275">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2276">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2276">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2277">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2277">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2278">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2278">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2279">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2279">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2280">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2280">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2281">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2281">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2282">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2282">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2283">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2283">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2284">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2284">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2285">이 함수는 해당  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2285">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2286">From 키워드를  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2286">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2287">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2287">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2288">이 함수는 해당  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2288">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2289">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2289">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2290">Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2290">Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2292">마스터 시민 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2292">master citizen number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2293">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2293">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2294">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2294">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2295">nationalnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2295">nationalnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2296">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2296">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2297">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2297">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2298">nationalnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2298">nationalnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2299">bnn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2299">bnn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2300">bnn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2300">bnn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2301">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2301">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2302">personalidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2302">personalidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2303">oib</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2303">oib</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2304">osobni identifikacijski broj</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2304">osobni identifikacijski broj</span></span>

   
## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2305">키프로스 드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2305">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2306">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2306">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2307">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2307">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2308">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2308">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2309">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2309">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2310">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2310">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2311">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2311">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2312">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2312">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2313">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2313">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2314">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2314">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2315">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2315">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2316">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2316">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2322">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2322">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2326">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2326">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2327">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2327">driver's licence number</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2331">키프로스 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2331">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2332">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2332">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2333">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2333">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2334">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2334">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2335">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2335">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2336">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2336">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2337">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2337">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2338">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2338">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2339">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2339">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2340">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2340">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2341">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2341">ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2342">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2342">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2343">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2343">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2344">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2344">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2345">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2345">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2346">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2346">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2347">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2347">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2348">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2348">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2349">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2349">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2350">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2350">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2351">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2351">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2352">kimlik karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2352">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2353">국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2353">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2354">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2354">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2355">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2355">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2356">키프로스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2356">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2357">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2357">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2358">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2358">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2359">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 6-8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2359">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2360">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2360">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2361">한 문자 다음에 6 ~ 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2361">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2362">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2362">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2363">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2363">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2364">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2364">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2365">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2365">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2366">정규식이 해당  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2366">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2367">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2367">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2368">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2368">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2369">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2369">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2370">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2370">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2371">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2371">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2372">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2372">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2373">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2373">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2374">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2374">passportno</span></span>
