- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2377">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2377">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2378">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2378">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2379">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2379">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2380">Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2380">Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2381">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2381">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2382">pasaportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2382">pasaportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2383">Αριθμός Διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2383">Αριθμός Διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2384">κυπριακό διαβατήριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2384">κυπριακό διαβατήριο</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2385">διαβατήριο #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2385">διαβατήριο#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2386">διαβατήριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2386">διαβατήριο</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2387">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2387">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2388">고 aport Kimliği</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2388">Pasaport Kimliği</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2389">고 aport numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2389">pasaport numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2390">고 aport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2390">Pasaport no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2391">Αρ.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2391">Αρ.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2392">Διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2392">Διαβατηρίου</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2393">키프로스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2393">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2394">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2394">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2395">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2395">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2396">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2396">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2397">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2397">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2398">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2398">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2399">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2399">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2400">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2400">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2401">지정 된 패턴에서 8 자리 및 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2401">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2402">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2402">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2403">8 자리 숫자와 1 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2403">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2404">"0" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2404">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2405">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2405">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2406">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2406">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2407">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2407">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2408">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2408">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2409">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2409">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2410">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2410">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2411">이 함수는 해당  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2411">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2412">From 키워드를  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2412">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2413">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2413">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2414">이 함수는 해당  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2414">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2415">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2415">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2416">Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2416">Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2417">tax id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2419">세금 식별 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2419">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2420">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2420">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2421">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2421">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2422">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2422">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2423">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2423">tax number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2426">taxidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2426">taxidno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2428">taxno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2428">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2429">taxnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2429">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2430">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2430">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2431">tic #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2431">tic#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2432">tic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2432">tic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2433">언급 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2433">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2434">언급 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2434">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2435">언급 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2435">tin#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2436">vergi kimlik kodu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2436">vergi kimlik kodu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2437">vergi kimlik numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2437">vergi kimlik numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2438">αριθμός φορολογικού μητρώου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2438">αριθμός φορολογικού μητρώου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2439">κωδικός φορολογικού μητρώου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2439">κωδικός φορολογικού μητρώου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2440">φορολογική ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2440">φορολογική ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2441">φορολογικού κωδικού</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2441">φορολογικού κωδικού</span></span>


## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2442">체코어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2442">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2443">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2443">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2444">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2444">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2445">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2445">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2446">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2446">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2447">8 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2447">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2448">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2448">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2449">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2449">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2450">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2450">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2451">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2451">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2452">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2452">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2453">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2453">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2454">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2454">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2455">정규식이 해당  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2455">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2456">From 키워드를  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2456">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>

```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2462">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2462">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2468">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2468">driver's license number</span></span>

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2473">체코어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2473">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2474">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2474">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2475">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2476">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2476">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2477">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2477">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2478">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2478">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2479">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2479">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2480">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2480">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2481">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2481">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2482">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2482">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2483">정규식이 해당  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2483">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2484">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2484">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2503">체코어 개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2503">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2504">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2504">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2505">선택적 슬래시 (이전 형식)가 있는 9 자리 숫자와 슬래시 (새 형식)가 있는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2505">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) ten digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2506">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2506">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2507">9 자리 숫자 (이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2507">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2508">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2508">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2509">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2509">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2510">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2510">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2511">10 자리 숫자 (새 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2511">ten digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2512">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2512">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2513">선택적 슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2513">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2514">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2514">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2515">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2515">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2516">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2516">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2517">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2517">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2518">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2518">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2519">Func_czech_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2519">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2520">Keyword_czech_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2520">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2521">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2521">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2522">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2522">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2523">Func_czech_id_card_new_format 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2523">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2524">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2524">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2553">social security number</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2554">tax id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2558">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2558">tax no</span></span>

## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2571">체코어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2571">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2572">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2572">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2573">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2573">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2574">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2574">ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2575">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2575">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2576">10 자리 숫자와 백슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2576">ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2577">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2577">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2578">백슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2578">a backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2579">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2579">three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2580">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2580">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2581">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2581">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2582">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2582">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2583">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2583">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2584">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2584">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2585">이 함수는 해당  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2585">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2586">From 키워드를  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2586">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2587">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2587">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2588">이 함수는 해당  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2588">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2589">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2589">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2593">개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2593">personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2594">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2594">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2595">nationalnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2595">nationalnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2596">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2596">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2597">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2597">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2598">국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2598">national number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2599">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2599">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2600">personalidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2600">personalidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2601">rč</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2601">rč</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2602">rodné číslo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2602">rodné číslo</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2603">rodne cislo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2603">rodne cislo</span></span>


## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2604">덴마크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2604">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2605">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2605">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2606">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2606">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2607">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2607">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2608">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2608">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2609">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2609">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2610">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2610">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2611">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2611">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2612">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2612">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2613">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2613">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2614">정규식이 해당  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2614">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2615">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2615">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2621">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2621">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2623">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2623">drivers license</span></span>

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2632">덴마크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2632">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2633">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2633">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2634">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2634">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2635">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2635">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2636">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2636">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2637">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2637">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2638">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2638">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2639">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2639">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2640">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2640">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2641">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2641">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2642">정규식이 해당  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2642">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2643">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2643">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2660">덴마크 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2660">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2661">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2662">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2662">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2663">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2664">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2664">ten digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2665">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2665">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2666">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2666">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2667">마지막 숫자가 검사 숫자인 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2667">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2668">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2669">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2669">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2670">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2671">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2671">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2672">정규식 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2672">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2673">Keyword_denmark_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2673">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2674">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2674">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2675">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2675">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2676">정규식 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2676">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2677">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2677">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2749">덴마크 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2749">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2750">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2750">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2751">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2751">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2752">지정 된 패턴의 10 자리 및 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2752">ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2753">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2753">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2754">10 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2754">ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2755">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2755">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2756">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2756">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2757">일련 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2757">four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2758">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2758">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2759">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2759">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2760">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2760">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2761">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2761">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2762">이 함수는 해당  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2762">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2763">From 키워드를  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2763">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2764">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2764">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2765">이 함수는 해당  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2765">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2766">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2766">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2767">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2767">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2768">개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2768">personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2769">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2769">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2770">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2770">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2771">nationalnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2771">nationalnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2772">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2772">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2773">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2773">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2774">국가 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2774">national number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2775">개인 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2775">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2776">personalidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2776">personalidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2777">cpr-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2777">cpr-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2778">personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2778">personnummer</span></span>


## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2779">DEA (약품 집행 기관) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2779">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2780">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2781">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2781">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2782">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2783">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2783">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2784">이 가능한 문자 집합에서의 한 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함): abcdefghjklmnprstux (등록자 성의 코드)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2784">one letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2785">1 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 등록자 성의 성의 첫 번째 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2785">one letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2786">검사 숫자의 마지막 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2786">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2787">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2787">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2788">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2788">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2789">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2789">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2790">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2790">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2791">Func_dea_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2791">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2792">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2792">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- DEA Number -->
<Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2793">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2793">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2794">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2794">none</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2795">에스토니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2795">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2796">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2796">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2797">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2797">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2798">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2798">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2799">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2799">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2800">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2800">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2801">문자 "ET" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2801">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2802">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2802">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2803">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2803">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2804">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2804">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2805">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2805">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2806">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2806">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2807">정규식이 해당  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2807">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2808">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2808">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2809">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2809">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_estonia_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2810">Keywords_estonia_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2810">Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2811">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2811">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2812">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2812">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2813">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2813">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2814">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2814">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2815">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2815">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2816">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2816">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2817">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2817">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2818">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2818">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2819">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2819">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2820">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2820">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2821">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2821">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2822">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2822">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2823">permis de conduire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2823">permis de conduire</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2824">에스토니아 개인 식별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2824">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2825">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2825">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2826">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2826">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2827">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2827">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2828">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2828">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2829">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2829">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2830">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2830">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2831">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2831">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2832">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2832">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2833">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2833">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2834">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2834">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2835">출생의 성별 및 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (예: 1-2 암, 수, 19th 세기, 3-4:20th 세기, 5-6 = 21 세기)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2835">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2836">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2836">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2837">같은 날짜에 태어난 사람을 구분 하는 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2837">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2838">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2838">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2839">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2839">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2840">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2840">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2841">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2841">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2842">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2842">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2843">이 함수는 해당  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2843">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2844">From 키워드를  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2844">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2845">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2845">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2846">이 함수는 해당  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2846">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2879">에스토니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2879">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2880">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2880">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2881">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2881">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2882">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 1 개 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2882">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2883">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2883">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2884">1 개의 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2884">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2885">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2885">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2886">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2886">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2887">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2887">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2888">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2888">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2889">정규식이 해당  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2889">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2890">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2890">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2904">eesti kodaniku pass si 번호 passinumbrid 문서 번호 문서에 dokumendi veiligheid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2904">eesti kodaniku pass passi number passinumbrid document number document no dokumendi nr</span></span>

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2905">EU 직불 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2905">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2906">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2906">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2907">16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2907">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2908">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2908">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2909">매우 복잡하고 강력한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2909">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2910">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2910">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2911">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2911">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2912">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2912">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2913">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2913">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2914">Func_eu_debit_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2914">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2915">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2915">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2916">Keyword_eu_debit_card의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2916">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2917">Keyword_card_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2917">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2918">Keyword_card_security_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2918">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2919">Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2919">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2920">Func_expiration_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2920">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-2921">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-2921">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3367">핀란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3367">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3368">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3368">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3369">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3369">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3370">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3370">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3371">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3371">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3372">하이픈을 포함 하는 10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3372">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3373">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3373">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3374">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3374">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3375">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3375">four digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3376">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3376">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3377">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3377">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3378">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3378">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3379">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3379">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3380">정규식이 해당  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3380">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3381">From 키워드를  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3381">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3382">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3382">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_finland_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3383">Keywords_finland_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3383">Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3384">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3384">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3385">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3385">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3386">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3386">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3387">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3387">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3388">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3388">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3389">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3389">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3390">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3390">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3391">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3391">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3392">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3392">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3393">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3393">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3394">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3394">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3395">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3395">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3396">ajokortti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3396">ajokortti</span></span>


## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3397">핀란드 유럽 건강 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3397">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3398">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3398">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3399">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3399">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3400">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3400">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3401">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3401">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3402">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3402">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3403">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3403">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3404">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3404">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3405">20 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3405">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3406">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3406">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3407">20 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3407">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3408">10 자리 숫자-8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3408">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3409">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3409">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3410">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3410">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3411">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3411">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3412">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3412">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3413">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3413">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3414">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3414">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3415">Regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3415">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3416">Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3416">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3417">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3417">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_finland_european_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3418">Keyword_finland_european_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3418">Keyword_finland_european_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3419">ehic #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3419">ehic#</span></span>

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3434">핀란드 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3434">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3435">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3435">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3436">6 자리 숫자와 세기를 나타내는 문자 및 3 자리 숫자와 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3436">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3437">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3437">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3438">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3438">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3439">생년월일에 해당 하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3439">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3440">세기 표식 ('-', ' + ' 또는 ' a ')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3440">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3441">3 자리 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3441">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3442">검사 숫자에 해당 하는 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3442">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3443">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3444">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3444">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3445">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3446">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3446">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3447">Func_finnish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3447">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3448">Keyword_finnish_national_id에서 키워드를 찾음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3448">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3449">체크섬 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3449">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3450">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3450">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3451">Func_finnish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3451">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3452">체크섬 통과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3452">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
