## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3501">핀란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3501">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3502">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3502">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3503">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3503">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3504">9 개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3504">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3505">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3505">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3506">9 개의 문자와 숫자를 조합한 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3506">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3507">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3507">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3508">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3508">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3509">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3509">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3510">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3510">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3511">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3511">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3512">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3512">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3513">정규식 Regex_finland_passport_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3513">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3514">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common 또는 Keyword_finland_passport_number의 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3514">A keyword from Keywords_eu_passport_number_common or Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3515">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3515">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3516">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3516">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3517">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3517">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3518">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3518">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3519">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3519">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3520">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3520">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3521">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3521">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3522">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3522">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3523">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3523">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3524">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3524">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3525">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3525">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3526">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3526">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_finland_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3527">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3527">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3528">suomalainen (si)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3528">suomalainen passi</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3529">passin numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3529">passin numero</span></span>

## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3535">핀란드 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3535">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3536">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3536">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3537">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3537">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3538">지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3538">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3539">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3539">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3540">다음은 지정 된 형식의 11 자 조합입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3540">an 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3541">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3541">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3542">다음 중 하나의 인스턴스에 대해 다음을 수행 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3542">one instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3543">더하기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3543">plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3544">빼기 기호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3544">minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3545">문자 "A" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3545">the letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3546">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3546">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3547">1 개의 문자 또는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3547">one letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3548">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3548">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3549">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3549">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3550">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3550">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3551">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3551">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3552">이 함수는 해당  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3552">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3553">From 키워드를  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3553">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3554">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3554">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3555">이 함수는 해당  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3555">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3556">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3556">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3557">Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3557">Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3561">핀란드어 국가 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3561">finnish national id number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3565">국가 id 번호입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3565">national id no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3566">국가 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3566">national id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3567">id 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3567">id no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3568">tunnistenumero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3568">tunnistenumero</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3571">ainutlaatuinen henkilökohtainen tunnus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3571">ainutlaatuinen henkilökohtainen tunnus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3572">identiteetti numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3572">identiteetti numero</span></span>

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3579">프랑스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3579">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3580">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형에 서 사용할 수 있으며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3580">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3581">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3581">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3582">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3582">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3583">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3583">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3584">비슷한 패턴(예: 프랑스 전화 번호)을 무시하기 위한 유효성 검사 기능을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3584">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3585">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3585">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3586">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3586">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3587">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3587">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3588">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3588">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3589">Func_french_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3589">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3590">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3590">at least one of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3591">Keyword_french_drivers_license에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3591">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3592">Func_eu_date 함수는 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3592">the function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3593">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3593">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_french_drivers_license"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3594">Keyword_french_drivers_license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3594">Keyword_french_drivers_license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3595">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3595">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3596">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3596">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3597">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3597">driving licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3598">driving license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3598">driving license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3599">permis de conduire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3599">permis de conduire</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3600">licence number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3600">licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3601">license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3601">license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3602">licence numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3602">licence numbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3603">license numbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3603">license numbers</span></span>


## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3604">프랑스 건강 보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3604">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3605">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3605">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3606">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3606">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3607">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3607">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3608">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3608">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3609">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3609">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3610">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3610">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3611">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3611">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3612">21 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3612">21 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3613">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3613">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3614">21 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3614">21 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3615">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3615">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3616">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3616">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3617">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3617">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3618">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3618">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3619">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3619">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3620">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3620">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3621">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3621">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3622">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3622">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3623">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3623">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3624">regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3624">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3625">Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3625">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3626">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3626">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3627">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3627">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3628">보험 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3628">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3629">carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3629">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3630">carte d'assuré social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3630">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3631">프랑스 국가 id 카드 (CNI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3631">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3632">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3632">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3633">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3633">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3634">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3634">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3635">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3635">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3636">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3636">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3637">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3637">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3638">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3638">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3639">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3639">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3640">Regex_france_cni 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3640">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3641">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3641">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3642">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3642">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3643">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3643">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3644">card number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3646">carte nationale d'idenite no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3646">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3647">cni #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3647">cni#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3648">cni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3648">cni</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3649">compte bancaire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3649">compte bancaire</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3650">국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3650">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3651">국가 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3651">national identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3652">nationalidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3652">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3653">numéro d'assurance maladie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3653">numéro d'assurance maladie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3654">numéro de carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3654">numéro de carte vitale</span></span>

   
## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3655">프랑스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3655">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3656">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3656">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3657">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3657">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3658">9 자리 숫자 및 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3658">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3659">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3659">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3660">9 자리 숫자 및 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3660">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3661">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3661">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3662">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3662">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3663">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3663">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3664">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3664">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3665">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3665">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3666">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3666">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3667">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3667">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3668">Func_fr_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3668">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3669">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3669">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3671">Keyword_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3671">Keyword_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3672">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3672">Passport Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3674">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3674">Passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3675">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3675">Passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3676">PassportID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3676">PassportID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3677">Passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3677">Passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3678">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3678">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3679">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3679">パスポート</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3680">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3680">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3681">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3681">パスポートのNum</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3682">パスポート ＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3682">パスポート ＃</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3683">Numéro de passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3683">Numéro de passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3684">Passeport n °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3684">Passeport n °</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3685">Passeport Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3685">Passeport Non</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3686">Passeport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3686">Passeport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3687">포트 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3687">Passeport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3688">지/포트 아님</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3688">PasseportNon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3689">Passeportn °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3689">Passeportn °</span></span>

      
## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3690">프랑스 사회 보장 번호 (INSEE) 또는 동등한 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3690">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3691">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 및 해당 ID와 관련 된 중요 한 정보 유형으로 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3691">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3692">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3692">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3693">15자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3693">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3694">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3694">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3695">다음 두 패턴 중 하나가 일치해야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3695">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3696">13 자리 숫자와 공백 다음 두 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3696">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3697">또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3697">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3698">15자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3698">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3699">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3699">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3700">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3700">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3701">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3701">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3702">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3702">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3703">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3703">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3704">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3704">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3705">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3705">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3706">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3706">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3707">Func_french_insee 또는 Func_fr_insee 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3707">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3708">Keyword_fr_insee의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3708">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3709">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3709">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3710">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3710">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_fr_insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3711">Keyword_fr_insee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3711">Keyword_fr_insee</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3712">insee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3712">insee</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3713">securité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3713">securité sociale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3714">securite sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3714">securite sociale</span></span>

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3735">프랑스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3735">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3736">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3736">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3737">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3737">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3738">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3738">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3739">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3739">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3740">0, 1, 2 또는 3 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3740">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3741">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3741">1 digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3742">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3742">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3743">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3743">2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3744">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3744">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3745">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3745">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3746">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3746">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3747">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3747">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3748">공백 1개(선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3748">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3749">3 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3749">3 check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3750">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3750">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3751">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3751">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3752">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3752">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3753">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3753">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3754">이 함수는 해당  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3754">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3755">From 키워드를  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3755">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3756">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3756">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3757">이 함수는 해당  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3757">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3768">taxid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3768">taxid#</span></span>

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3777">프랑스 값 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3777">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3778">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3778">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3779">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3779">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3780">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3780">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3781">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3781">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3782">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3782">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3783">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3783">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3784">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3784">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3785">13 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3785">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3786">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3786">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3787">13 문자 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3787">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3788">두 개의 문자-FR (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3788">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3789">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3789">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3790">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3790">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3791">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3791">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3792">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3792">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3793">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3793">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3794">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3794">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3795">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3795">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3796">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3796">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3797">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3797">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3798">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3798">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3799">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3799">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3800">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3800">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3801">Func_france_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3801">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3802">Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3802">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3803">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3804">Func_france_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3804">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3805">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3805">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3806">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3806">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3807">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3807">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3808">vat 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3808">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3809">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3809">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3810">부가 세금</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3810">value added tax</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3811">siren id 없음 numéro d'identification taxe sur siren ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3811">siren identification no numéro d'identification taxe sur valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3812">taxe valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3812">taxe valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3813">taxe sur la valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3813">taxe sur la valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3814">n ° tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3814">n° tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3815">numéro de</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3815">numéro de tva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3816">numéro d'identification siren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3816">numéro d'identification siren</span></span>


## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3817">독일 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3817">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3818">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3818">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3819">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3819">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3820">11 자리 숫자와 문자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3820">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3821">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3822">11자리 숫자와 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3822">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3823">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3823">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3824">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3824">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3825">6 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3825">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3826">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3826">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3827">숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3827">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3828">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3828">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3829">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3829">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3830">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3830">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3831">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3831">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3832">Func_german_drivers_license 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3832">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3833">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3833">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3834">Keyword_german_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3834">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3835">Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3835">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3836">Keyword_german_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3836">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3837">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3837">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_german_drivers_license"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3924">Keyword_german_drivers_license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3924">Keyword_german_drivers_license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3926">ausstellungsort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3926">ausstellungsort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3927">ausstellende behöde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3927">ausstellende behöde</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3928">ausstellende behorde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3928">ausstellende behorde</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3929">ausstellende behoerde</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3929">ausstellende behoerde</span></span>


## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3930">독일 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3930">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3931">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3931">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3932">2010 년 11 월 1 일 이후: 9 개 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3932">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3933">1 월 1987 년 10 월 31 일 (2010:10 자리 숫자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3933">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3934">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3934">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3935">2010 년 11 월 1 일 이후:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3935">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3936">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3936">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3937">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3937">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3938">1 년 4 월 1987 일 ~ 10 2010 월 31 일까 지:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3938">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3939">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3939">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3940">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3940">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3941">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3941">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3942">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3942">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3943">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3943">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3944">정규식 Regex_germany_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3944">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3945">Keyword_germany_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3945">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3946">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3946">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3947">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3947">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3948">ausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3948">ausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3949">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3949">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3950">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3950">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3951">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3951">identifikation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3952">identifizierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3952">identifizierungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3953">id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3953">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3954">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3954">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3955">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3955">id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3956">개인 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3956">personal id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3957">personalausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3957">personalausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3958">persönliche id nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3958">persönliche id nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3959">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3959">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3960">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3960">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3961">독일 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3961">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3962">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3962">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3963">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3963">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3964">10 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3964">ten digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3965">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3965">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3966">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3966">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3967">첫 번째 문자는 숫자 또는이 집합의 문자 (C, F, G, H, J, K)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3967">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3968">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3968">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3969">이 집합의 5 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (C,-H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3969">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3970">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3970">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3971">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3971">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3972">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3972">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3973">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3973">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3974">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3974">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3975">Func_german_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3975">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3976">From 키워드를 `Keyword_german_passport` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3976">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3977">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3977">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3978">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3978">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3979">Func_german_passport_data 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3979">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3980">From 키워드를 `Keyword_german_passport` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3980">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3981">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3981">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3982">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3982">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_german_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3983">Keyword_german_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3983">Keyword_german_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3984">reisepasse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3984">reisepasse</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3985">reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3985">reisepassnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3986">Reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3986">No-Reisepass</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3987">Veiligheid-Reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3987">Nr-Reisepass</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3988">Reisepass-Veiligheid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3988">Reisepass-Nr</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3989">Passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3989">Passnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3990">reisepässe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3990">reisepässe</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3991">포트 번호입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3991">passeport no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3992">포트 번호 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3992">passeport no</span></span>

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3993">독일 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3993">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3994">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3994">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3995">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3995">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3996">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3996">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3997">11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3997">11 digits :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3998">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3998">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-3999">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-3999">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4000">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4000">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4001">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4001">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4002">3자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4002">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4003">선택적 공백 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4003">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4004">2자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4004">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4005">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4005">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4006">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4006">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4007">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4007">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4008">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4008">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4009">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4009">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4010">이 함수는 해당  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4010">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4011">From 키워드를  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4011">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4012">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4012">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4013">이 함수는 해당  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4013">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4014">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4014">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4015">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4015">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4016">identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4016">identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4017">steuer id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4017">steuer id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4018">steueridentifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4018">steueridentifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4019">steuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4019">steuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4020">tax id
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4020">tax id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4026">세금 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4026">tax registration number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4034">언급 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4034">tin no</span></span>
