## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4039">독일 값 세금 번호 추가 됨</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4039">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4040">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4040">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4041">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4041">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4042">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4042">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4043">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4043">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4044">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4044">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4045">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4045">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4046">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4046">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4047">11 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4047">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4048">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4048">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4049">11 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4049">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4050">문자 D 또는 d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4050">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4051">문자 E 또는 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4051">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4052">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4052">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4053">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4053">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4054">선택적 공백 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4054">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4055">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4055">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4056">선택적 공백 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4056">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4057">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4057">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4058">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4058">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4059">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4059">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4060">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4060">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4061">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4061">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4062">Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4062">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4063">Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4063">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4064">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4064">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4065">Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4065">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4066">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4066">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4067">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4067">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4068">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4068">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4069">vat 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4069">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4070">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4070">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4071">vat # mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4071">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4072">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4072">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4073">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4073">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4074">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4074">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span></span>


## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4075">그리스 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4075">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4076">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4076">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4077">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4077">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4078">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4078">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4079">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4079">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4080">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4080">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4081">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4081">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4082">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4082">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4083">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4083">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4084">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4084">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4085">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4085">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4086">From 키워드를  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4086">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4087">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4087">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4088">Keywords_greece_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4088">Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4089">dlL #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4089">dlL#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4090">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4090">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4091">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4091">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4092">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4092">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4093">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4093">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4094">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4094">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4095">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4095">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4096">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4096">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4097">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4097">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4098">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4098">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4099">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4099">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4100">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4100">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4101">δεια οδήγησης</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4101">δεια οδήγησης</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4102">Adeia odigisis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4102">Adeia odigisis</span></span>


## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4103">그리스 국가 ID 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4103">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4104">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4104">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4105">7-8자리 문자 및 숫자와 대시의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4105">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4106">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4106">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4107">7자리 문자 및 숫자(이전 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4107">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4108">1개 문자(그리스어 알파벳의 임의 문자) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4108">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4109">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4109">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4110">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4110">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4111">8자리 문자와 숫자(새로운 형식):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4111">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4112">그리스어 및 라틴어 알파벳 둘 다에 해당 대문자가 포함된 2개 문자(ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4112">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4113">대시 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4113">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4114">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4114">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4115">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4115">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4116">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4116">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4117">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4117">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4118">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4118">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4119">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4119">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4120">Keyword_greece_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4120">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4121">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4121">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4122">정규식 Regex_greece_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4122">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4123">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4123">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4124">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4124">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4125">그리스 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4125">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4126">그리스 국가 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4126">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4127">그리스어 개인 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4127">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4128">그리스 경찰서 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4128">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4129">id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4129">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4130">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4130">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4131">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4131">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4132">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4132">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4133">그리스 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4133">Greece passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4134">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4134">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4135">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4135">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4136">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4136">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4137">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4137">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4138">2개 문자와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4138">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4139">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4139">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4140">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4140">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4141">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4141">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4142">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4142">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4143">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4143">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4144">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4144">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4145">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4145">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4146">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4146">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4147">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4147">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4148">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4148">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4149">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4149">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4150">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4150">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4151">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4151">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4152">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4152">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4153">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4153">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4154">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4154">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4155">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4155">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4156">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4156">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4157">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4157">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4158">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4158">αριθμός διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4159">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4159">αριθμούς διαβατηρίου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4160">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4160">αριθμός διαβατηριο</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4161">그리스 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4161">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4162">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4162">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4163">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4163">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4164">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4164">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4165">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4165">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4166">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4166">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4167">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4167">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4168">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4168">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4169">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4169">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4170">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4170">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4171">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4171">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4172">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4173">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4173">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4174">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4175">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4175">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4176">정규식이 해당  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4176">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4177">From 키워드를  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4177">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4178">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4178">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4186">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4186">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4187">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4187">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4188">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4188">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4189">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4189">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4190">세금 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4190">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4191">세금 레지스트리 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4191">tax registry no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4192">세금 레지스트리 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4192">tax registry number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4193">taxid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4193">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4194">taxidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4194">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4195">taxidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4195">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4196">taxno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4196">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4197">taxnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4197">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4198">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4198">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4199">taxregistryno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4199">taxregistryno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4200">언급 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4200">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4201">언급 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4201">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4202">언급 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4202">tin#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4205">φορολογικού μητρώου νο</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4205">φορολογικού μητρώου νο</span></span>


## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4206">HKID (홍콩 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4206">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4207">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4207">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4208">8-9자리 문자 및 숫자와 마지막 문자를 선택적 괄호로 묶어서 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4208">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4209">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4209">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4210">8-9자리 문자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4210">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4211">1-2개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4211">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4212">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4212">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4213">검사 숫자에 해당하고 선택적으로 괄호로 묶는 마지막 문자(임의 숫자 또는 문자 A)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4213">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4214">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4215">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4215">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4216">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4217">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4217">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4218">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4218">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4219">Keyword_hong_kong_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4219">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4220">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4221">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4221">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4222">Func_hong_kong_id_card 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4222">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4223">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4223">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4263">헝가리어 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4263">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4264">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4264">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4265">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4265">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4266">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4266">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4267">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4267">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4268">2 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4268">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4269">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4269">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4270">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4270">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4271">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4271">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4272">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4272">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4273">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4273">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4274">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4274">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4275">정규식이 해당  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4275">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4276">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4276">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4277">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4277">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4278">Keywords_hungary_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4278">Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4279">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4279">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4280">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4280">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4281">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4281">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4282">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4282">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4283">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4283">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4284">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4284">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4285">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4285">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4286">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4286">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4287">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4287">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4288">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4288">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4289">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4289">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4290">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4290">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4291">vezetoi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4291">vezetoi engedely</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4292">헝가리어 개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4292">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4293">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4293">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4294">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4294">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4295">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4295">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4296">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4296">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4297">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4297">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4298">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4298">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4299">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4299">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4300">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4300">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4301">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4301">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4302">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4302">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4303">성별에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (1gb, 2 암, 기타 번호는 두 개를 포함 하는 경우 1900에만 발생 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4303">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4304">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4304">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4305">일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4305">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4306">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4306">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4307">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4307">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4308">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4308">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4309">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4309">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4310">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4310">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4311">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4311">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4312">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4312">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4313">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4313">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4314">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4314">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4318">identification number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4318">identification number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4320">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4320">sz.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4321">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4321"> ig.</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4325">헝가리어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4325">Hungary passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4326">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4326">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4327">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4327">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4328">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 2 개 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4328">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4329">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4329">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4330">2 개의 문자 다음에 6 개 또는 7 개의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4330">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4331">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4331">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4332">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4332">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4333">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4333">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4334">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4334">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4335">정규식이 해당  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4335">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4336">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4336">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4347">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4347">passportnumbers</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4353">헝가리어 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 식별자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4353">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4354">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 해당 ID 중요 정보 유형에 서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4354">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4355">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4355">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4356">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4356">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4357">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4357">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4358">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4358">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4359">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4359">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4360">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4360">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4361">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4361">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4362">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4362">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4363">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4363">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4364">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4364">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4365">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4365">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4366">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4366">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4386">헝가리어 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4386">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4387">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4387">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4388">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4388">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4389">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4389">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4390">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4390">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4391">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4391">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4392">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4392">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4393">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4393">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4394">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4394">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4395">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4395">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4396">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4396">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4397">"8" 이어야 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4397">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4398">8자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4398">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4399">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4399">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4400">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4400">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4401">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4401">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4402">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4402">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4403">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4403">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4404">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4404">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4405">From 키워드를  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4405">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4406">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4406">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4407">이 함수는 해당  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4407">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
