## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4433">헝가리 값 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4433">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4434">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4434">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4435">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4435">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4436">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4436">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4437">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4437">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4438">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4438">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4439">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4439">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4440">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4440">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4441">10 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4441">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4442">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4442">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4443">10 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4443">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4444">2 개의 문자-HU 또는 HU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4444">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4445">선택적 공간</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4445">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4446">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4446">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4447">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4447">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4448">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4448">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4449">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4449">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4450">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4450">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4451">Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4451">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4452">Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4452">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4453">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4453">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4454">Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4454">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4455">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4455">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_hungary_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4456">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4456">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4457">vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4457">vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4458">값이 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4458">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4459">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4459">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4460">vatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4460">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4461">hungarianvatno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4461">hungarianvatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4462">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4462">tax no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4463">부가 세금 áfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4463">value added tax áfa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4464">közösségi adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4464">közösségi adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4465">általános forgalmi adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4465">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4466">hozzáadottérték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4466">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4467">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4467">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4468">인도 (영구 계정 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4468">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4469">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4469">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4470">10자리 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4470">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4471">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4471">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4472">10자리 문자 또는 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4472">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4473">5개 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4473">Five letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4474">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4474">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4475">알파벳 검사 숫자에 해당하는 문자 1개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4475">A letter which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4476">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4476">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4477">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4477">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4478">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4478">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4479">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4479">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4480">정규식 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4480">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4481">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4481">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4482">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4482">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
<Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4483">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4483">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4484">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4484">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4485">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4485">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4486">확대</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4486">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4487">Aadhaar (인도 고유 식별) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4487">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4488">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4488">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4489">선택적 공백 또는 대시를 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4489">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4490">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4490">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4491">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4491">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4492">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4492">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4493">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4493">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4494">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4494">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4495">선택적 공백 또는 대시 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4495">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4496">검사 숫자에 해당하는 마지막 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4496">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4497">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4497">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4498">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4498">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4499">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4499">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4500">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4500">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4501">Func_india_aadhaar 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4501">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4502">Keyword_india_aadhar에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4502">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4503">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4503">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4504">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4504">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4505">Func_india_aadhaar 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4505">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4506">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4506">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4507">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4507">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4508">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4508">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4509">Aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4509">Aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4510">Aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4510">Aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4511">UID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4511">UID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4512">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4512">आधार</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4513">인도네시아 id 카드 (KTP) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4513">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4514">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4514">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4515">선택적으로 마침표를 포함하는 16자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4515">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4516">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4516">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4517">16자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4517">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4518">2자리 시/도 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4518">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4519">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4519">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4520">2자리 지역 또는 구/군/시 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4520">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4521">2자리 소구역 코드 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4521">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4522">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4522">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4523">생년월일에 해당하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6자리 숫자 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4523">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4524">마침표(옵션) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4524">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4525">4자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4525">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4526">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4526">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4527">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4527">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4528">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4528">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4529">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4529">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4530">정규식 Regex_indonesia_id_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4530">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4531">Keyword_indonesia_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4531">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4532">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4532">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4533">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4533">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4534">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4534">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4535">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4535">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4536">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4536">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4537">IBAN (국제 은행 계좌 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4537">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4538">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4539">국가 코드 (두 문자) + 검사 숫자 (2 자리 숫자)와 bban 숫자 (최대 30 자)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4539">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4540">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4540">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4541">패턴에는 다음이 모두 포함되어야 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4541">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4542">두 글자로 된 국가 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4542">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4543">두 개의 검사 숫자 (선택적 공백)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4543">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4544">1-7 개 문자 또는 숫자의 그룹 (공백으로 구분 가능)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4544">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4545">1-3 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4545">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4546">각 국가의 형식은 약간 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4546">The format for each country is slightly different.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4547">IBAN 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음과 같은 60 국가를 포함 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4547">The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4548">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, to, do, ee, es, fi,,, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, kw, il, vg,, nl-nl, tn,,,,,,,,, ,,,,,,,,,,,,, rs, l, se, si,</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4548">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4549">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4549">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4550">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4550">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4551">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4551">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4552">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4552">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4553">Func_iban 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4553">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4554">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4554">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4555">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4555">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4556">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4556">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4557">Diseases의 국제 분류 (ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4557">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4558">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4558">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4559">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4559">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4560">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4560">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4561">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4561">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4562">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4562">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4563">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4563">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4564">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4564">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4565">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4565">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4566">Dictionary_icd_10_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4566">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4567">Dictionary_icd_10_codes에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4567">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4568">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4568">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4569">업데이트 된 Dictionary_icd_10_ 키워드를 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4569">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4570">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4570">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4571">[Diseases의 국제 분류, 10 번째 개정판, 임상 수정 (icd-10CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)을 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4571">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4572">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어에 대해서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4572">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4573">[Diseases의 국제 분류, 10 번째 개정판, 임상 수정 (icd-10CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)을 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4573">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4574">이 유형은 설명에 해당 하는 보험 코드 에서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4574">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4575">Diseases의 국제 분류 (ICD-9-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4575">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4576">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4576">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4577">사전</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4577">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4578">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4578">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4579">Keyword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4579">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4580">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4580">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4581">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4581">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4582">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4582">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4583">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4583">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4584">Dictionary_icd_9_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4584">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4585">Dictionary_icd_9_codes에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4585">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4586">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4586">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4587">Dictionary_icd_9_updated에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4587">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4588">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4588">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4589">[Diseases, 아홉 번째 Revision, 임상 수정 (icd-9CM)의 국가별 분류](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)를 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4589">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4590">이 유형은 보험 코드가 아니라 용어에 대해서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4590">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4591">[Diseases, 아홉 번째 Revision, 임상 수정 (icd-9CM)의 국가별 분류](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)를 기반으로 하는 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 키워드 사전의 모든 용어입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4591">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4592">이 유형은 설명에 해당 하는 보험 코드 에서만 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4592">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4593">IP 주소</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4593">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4594">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4594">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4595">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4595">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4596">IPv4 주소의 서식 있는 버전(마침표 있음) 및 서식 없는 버전(마침표 없음)으로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4596">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4597">IPv6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4597">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4598">서식 있는(콜론 포함) IPv6 번호로 구성된 복잡한 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4598">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4599">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4599">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4600">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4600">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4601">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4601">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4602">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4602">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4603">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4603">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4604">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4604">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4605">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4605">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4606">IPv4의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4606">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4607">Regex_ipv4_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4607">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4608">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4608">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4609">IPv6의 경우 DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 95% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4609">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4610">Regex_ipv6_address 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4610">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4611">Keyword_ipaddress의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4611">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4612">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4612">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4613">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4613">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4614">IP(이 키워드는 대/소문자를 구분함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4614">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4615">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4615">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4616">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4616">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4617">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4617">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4618">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4618">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4619">아일랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4619">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4620">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4620">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4621">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4621">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4622">6 자리 숫자와 4 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4622">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4623">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4623">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4624">6 자리 숫자와 4 개 문자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4624">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4625">6자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4625">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4626">4 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4626">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4627">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4627">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4628">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4628">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4629">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4629">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4630">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4630">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4631">정규식이 해당  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4631">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4632">From 키워드를  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4632">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4633">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4633">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_ireland_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4634">Keywords_ireland_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4634">Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4635">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4635">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4636">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4636">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4637">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4637">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4638">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4638">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4639">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4639">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4640">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4640">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4641">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4641">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4642">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4642">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4643">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4643">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4644">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4644">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4645">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4645">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4646">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4646">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4647">ceadúnas tiomána</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4647">ceadúnas tiomána</span></span>


## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4648">아일랜드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4648">Ireland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4649">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4649">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4650">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4650">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4651">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4651">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4652">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4652">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4653">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4653">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4654">2자리 숫자 또는 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4654">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4655">7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4655">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4656">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4656">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4657">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4657">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4658">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4658">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4659">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4659">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4660">정규식이 해당  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4660">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4661">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4661">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4682">아일랜드 PPS (개인 공개 서비스) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4682">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4683">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4684">이전 형식 (31 년 12 월 2012 일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4684">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4685">7 자리 숫자와 1-2 자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4685">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4686">새 형식 (1 년 1 월 2013 및 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4686">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4687">7 자리 숫자와 2 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4687">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4688">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4688">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4689">이전 형식 (31 년 12 월 2012 일까지):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4689">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4690">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4690">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4691">1 ~ 2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4691">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4692">새 형식 (1 년 1 월 2013 및 이후):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4692">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4693">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4693">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4694">알파벳 검사 숫자에 해당 하는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4694">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4695">A-I 범위의 선택적 문자 또는 "W"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4695">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4696">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4696">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4697">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4697">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4698">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4698">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4699">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4699">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4700">Func_ireland_pps 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4700">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4701">Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4701">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4702">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4702">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4703">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4703">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4704">Func_ireland_pps 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4704">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4705">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4705">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4750">이스라엘 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4750">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4751">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4751">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4752">13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4752">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4753">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4753">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4754">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4754">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4755">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4755">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4756">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4756">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4757">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4757">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4758">대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4758">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4759">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4759">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4760">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4760">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4761">13자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4761">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4762">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4762">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4763">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4763">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4764">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4764">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4765">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4765">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4766">Regex_israel_bank_account_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4766">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4767">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4767">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4768">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4768">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4769">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4769">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4770">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4770">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4771">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4771">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4772">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4772">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4773">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4773">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4774">이스라엘 국내 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4774">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4775">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4775">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4776">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4776">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4777">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4777">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4778">9 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4778">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4779">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4779">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4780">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4780">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4781">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4781">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4782">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4782">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4783">Func_israeli_national_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4783">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4784">Keyword_Israel_National_ID의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4784">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4785">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4785">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4786">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4786">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4787">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4787">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4788">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4788">מספר זהות</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4789">National ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4789">National ID Number</span></span>
   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4790">이탈리아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4790">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4791">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 한 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4791">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4792">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4792">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4793">10 개의 문자 및 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4793">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4794">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4794">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4795">10 개의 문자와 숫자를 조합한 것입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4795">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4796">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4796">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4797">문자 "A" 또는 "V" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4797">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4798">7 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함), 숫자 또는 밑줄 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4798">seven letters (not case sensitive), digits, or the underscore character</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4799">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4799">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4800">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4800">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4801">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4801">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4802">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4802">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4803">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4804">Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4804">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4805">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4805">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4806">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4806">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4807">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4807">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4808">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4808">numero di patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4809">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4809">patente di guida</span></span> 

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4810">이탈리아 회계 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4810">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4811">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4811">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4812">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4812">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4813">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4813">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4814">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4814">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4815">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4815">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4816">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4816">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4817">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4817">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4818">지정 된 패턴에 해당 하는 문자 및 숫자의 16 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4818">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4819">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4819">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4820">문자와 숫자의 16 자 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4820">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4821">가족 이름에서 처음 세 개의 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4821">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4822">이름의 첫 번째, 세 번째 및 네 번째 자음에 해당 하는 3 개의 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4822">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4823">출생 연도의 마지막 자리에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4823">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4824">출생 월의 문자에 해당 하는 한 문자는 알파벳 순서로 사용 되지만 1 ~ E, H, L, M, P, R에 해당 하는 문자를 사용 하는 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4824">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4825">genders를 구분 하기 위해 출생 달의 날짜에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자 (40)가 여성 생년월일에 추가 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4825">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4826">사용자가 태어난 municipality 관련 지역 번호에 해당 하는 4 자리 숫자 (국가 전체 코드는 외국 국가에 사용 됨)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4826">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4827">1 개의 패리티 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4827">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4828">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4828">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4829">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4829">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4830">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4830">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4831">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4831">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4832">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4832">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4833">From 키워드를  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4833">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4834">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4834">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4835">이 함수는 해당  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4835">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4836">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4836">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4837">Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4837">Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4838">codice 회계</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4838">codice fiscal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4839">codice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4839">codice fiscale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4840">codice id personale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4840">codice id personale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4841">codice personale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4841">codice personale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4842">회계 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4842">fiscal code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4843">numero certificato personale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4843">numero certificato personale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4844">numero di identificazione fiscale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4844">numero di identificazione fiscale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4845">numero id personale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4845">numero id personale</span></span>

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4870">이탈리아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4870">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4871">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4871">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4872">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4872">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4873">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4873">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4874">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4874">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4875">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4875">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4876">2 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4876">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4877">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4877">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4878">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4878">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4879">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4879">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4880">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4880">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4881">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4881">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4882">정규식이 해당  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4882">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4883">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4883">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4888">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4888">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4889">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4889">passports</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4894">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4894">passportnumbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_italy_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4896">Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4896">Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4897">italiana passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4897">italiana passaporto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4898">passaporto italiana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4898">passaporto italiana</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4900">numéro (고) 포트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4900">numéro passeport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4902">numeri del passaporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4902">numeri del passaporto</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4903">포트 italien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4903">passeport italien</span></span>

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4904">이탈리아 값 세금 번호 추가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4904">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4905">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4905">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4906">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4906">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4907">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4907">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4908">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4908">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4909">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4909">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4910">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4910">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4911">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4911">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4912">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 13 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4912">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4913">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4913">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4914">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 13 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4914">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4915">I 또는 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4915">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4916">T 또는 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4916">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4917">선택적 공백, 점, 하이픈 또는 쉼표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4917">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4918">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4918">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4919">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4919">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4920">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4920">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4921">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4921">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4922">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4922">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4923">Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4923">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4924">Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4924">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4925">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4925">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4926">Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4926">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4927">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4927">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4928">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4928">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4929">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4929">vat number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4931">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4931">vat#</span></span>
