## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4934">일본 은행 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4934">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4935">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4935">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4936">7 또는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4936">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4937">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4937">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4938">은행 계좌 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4938">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4939">7 또는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4939">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4940">은행 계좌 분기 코드:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4940">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4941">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4941">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4942">공백 또는 대시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4942">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4943">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4943">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4944">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4945">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4945">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4946">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4947">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4947">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4948">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4948">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4949">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4949">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4950">다음 중 하나가 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4950">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4951">Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4951">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4952">Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4952">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4953">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4953">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4954">Func_jp_bank_account 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4954">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-4955">Keyword_jp_bank_account의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-4955">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5014">일본 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5014">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5015">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5016">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5016">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5017">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5017">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5018">12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5018">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5019">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5019">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5020">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5020">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5021">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5021">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5022">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5022">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5023">Func_jp_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5023">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5024">Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5024">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5052">일본 내 번호-회사</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5052">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5053">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5053">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5054">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5054">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5055">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5055">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5056">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5056">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5057">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5057">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5058">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5058">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5059">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5059">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5060">13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5060">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5061">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5061">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5062">13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5062">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5063">1 ~ 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5063">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5064">12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5064">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5065">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5065">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5066">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5066">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5067">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5067">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5068">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5068">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5069">Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5069">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5070">Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5070">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5071">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5071">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5072">Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5072">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5073">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5073">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_japan_my_number_corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5074">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5074">Keyword_japan_my_number_corporate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5075">회사 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5075">corporate number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5076">マイナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5076">マイナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5077">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5077">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5078">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5078">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5079">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5079">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5080">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5080">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5081">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5081">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5082">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5082">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5083">法人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5083">法人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5084">指定通知書</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5084">指定通知書</span></span>


## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5085">일본 내 번호-개인</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5085">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5086">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5086">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5087">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5087">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5088">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5088">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5089">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5089">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5090">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5090">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5091">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5091">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5092">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5092">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5093">12 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5093">12 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5094">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5094">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5095">12 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5095">12 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5096">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5096">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5097">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5097">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5098">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5098">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5099">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5099">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5100">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5100">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5101">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5101">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5102">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5102">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5103">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5103">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5104">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5104">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5105">Func_japanese_my_number_personal 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5105">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5106">Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5106">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5107">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5107">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5108">Func_japanese_my_number_personal 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5108">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5114">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5114">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5115">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5115">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5116">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5116">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5117">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5117">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5118">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5118">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5119">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5119">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5120">通知カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5120">通知カード</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5121">일본 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5121">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5122">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5122">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5123">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5123">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5124">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5124">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5125">2 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5125">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5126">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5126">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5127">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5127">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5128">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5128">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5129">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5129">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5130">Func_jp_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5130">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5131">Keyword_jp_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5131">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5132">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5132">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5133">Keyword_jp_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5133">Keyword_jp_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5134">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5134">パスポート</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5135">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5135">パスポート番号</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5136">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5136">パスポートのNum</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5137">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5137">パスポート＃</span></span> 

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5138">일본 거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5138">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5139">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5139">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5140">12 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5140">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5141">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5141">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5142">12 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5142">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5143">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5143">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5144">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5144">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5145">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5145">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5146">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5146">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5147">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5147">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5148">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5148">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5149">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5149">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5150">정규식 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5150">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5151">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5151">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5152">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5152">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5153">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5153">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5154">거주지 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5154">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5155">거주지 카드 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5155">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5156">거주지 카드 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5156">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5157">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5157">在留カード番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5158">일본 상주 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5158">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5159">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5159">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5160">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5160">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5161">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5161">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5162">11자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5162">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5163">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5163">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5164">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5164">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5165">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5165">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5166">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5166">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5167">Func_jp_resident_registration_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5167">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5168">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5168">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5169">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5169">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5170">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5170">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5171">Resident Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5171">Resident Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5172">Resident Register Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5172">Resident Register Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5173">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5173">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5174">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5174">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5175">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5175">Resident Register No.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5179">住民基本登録番号、登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5179">住民基本登録番号、登録番号</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5180">住民基本レジストリ番号を常駐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5180">住民基本レジストリ番号を常駐</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5181">登録番号を常駐住民基本台帳登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5181">登録番号を常駐住民基本台帳登録番号</span></span> 

   
## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5182">일본 SIN (사회 보험 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5182">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5183">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5184">7-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5184">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5185">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5186">7-12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5186">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5187">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5187">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5188">하이픈 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5188">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5189">6 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5189">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5190">7-12자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5190">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5191">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5192">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5192">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5193">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5194">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5194">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5195">Func_jp_sin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5195">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5196">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5196">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5197">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5197">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5198">Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5198">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5199">Keyword_jp_sin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5199">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5200">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5200">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5201">Keyword_jp_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5201">Keyword_jp_sin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5202">Social Insurance No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5202">Social Insurance No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5203">Social Insurance Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5203">Social Insurance Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5204">Social Insurance Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5204">Social Insurance Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5205">社会保険のテンキー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5205">社会保険のテンキー</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5206">社会保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5206">社会保険番号</span></span> 

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5207">라트비아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5207">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5208">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5208">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5209">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5209">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5210">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5210">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5211">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5211">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5212">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5212">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5213">3 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5213">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5214">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5214">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5215">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5215">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5216">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5216">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5217">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5217">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5218">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5218">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5219">정규식이 해당  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5219">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5220">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5220">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5229">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5229">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5230">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5230">driver's license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5233">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5233">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5236">라트비아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5236">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5237">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5237">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5238">11 자리 숫자와 선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5238">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5239">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5239">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5240">이전 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5240">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5241">11 자리 숫자와 하이픈:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5241">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5242">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5242">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5243">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5243">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5244">출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자 (19th 세기의 경우 "1", 21 세기의 경우 "2")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5244">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5245">임의로 생성 되는 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5245">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5246">새 형식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5246">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5247">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5247">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5248">두 자리 숫자 "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5248">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5249">9자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5249">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5250">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5250">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5251">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5251">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5252">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5252">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5253">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5253">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5254">Function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 또는 regex에서 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5254">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5255">From 키워드를  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5255">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5256">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5256">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5257">Function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 또는 regex에서 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5257">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5320">라트비아, 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5320">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5321">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5321">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5322">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5322">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5323">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5323">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5324">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5324">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5325">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자와 7 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5325">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5326">2 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5326">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5327">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5327">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5328">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5328">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5329">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5329">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5330">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5330">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5331">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5331">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5332">정규식이 해당  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5332">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5333">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5333">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5334">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5334">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5335">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5335">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5336">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5336">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5337">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5337">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5338">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5338">passportid</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5353">리투아니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5353">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5354">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5354">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5355">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5355">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5356">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5356">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5357">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5357">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5358">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5358">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5359">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5359">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5360">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5360">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5361">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5361">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5362">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5362">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5363">정규식이 해당  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5363">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5364">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5364">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5370">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5370">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5376">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5376">driver's licence number</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5380">리투아니아 개인 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5380">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5381">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5381">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5382">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5382">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5383">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5383">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5384">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5384">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5385">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5385">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5386">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5386">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5387">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5388">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5388">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5389">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5390">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 11 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5390">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5391">사용자의 성별 및 출생 세기에 해당 하는 1 자리 (1-6)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5391">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5392">생년월일에 해당 하는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5392">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5393">출생 날짜의 일련 번호에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5393">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5394">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5394">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5395">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5395">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5396">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5396">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5397">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5397">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5398">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5398">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5399">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5399">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5400">From 키워드를  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5400">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5401">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5401">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5402">이 함수는 해당  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5402">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5437">리투아니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5437">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5438">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5438">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5439">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5439">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5440">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5440">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5441">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5441">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5442">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5442">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5443">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5444">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5444">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5445">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5446">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5446">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5447">정규식이 해당  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5447">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5448">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5448">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5451">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5451">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5452">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5452">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5453">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5453">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5454">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5454">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5455">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5455">passportno</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5458">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5458">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5459">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5459">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5460">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5460">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5461">Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5461">Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5462">numeris</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5462">paso numeris</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5463">#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5463">paso numeriai</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5464">veiligheid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5464">paso nr</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5465">룩셈부르크 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5465">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5466">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5466">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5467">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5467">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5468">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5468">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5469">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5469">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5470">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5470">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5471">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5471">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5472">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5472">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5473">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5473">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5474">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5474">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5475">정규식이 해당  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5475">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5476">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5476">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5482">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5482">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5483">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5483">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5484">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5484">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5485">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5485">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5486">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5486">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5487">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5487">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5488">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5488">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5489">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5489">driving license number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5491">fahrerlaubnis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5491">fahrerlaubnis</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5492">룩셈부르크 국내 식별 번호 (자연어)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5492">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5493">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5493">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5494">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5494">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5495">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5495">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5496">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5496">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5497">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5497">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5498">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5498">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5499">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5499">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5500">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5500">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5501">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5501">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5502">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5502">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5503">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5503">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5504">두 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5504">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5505">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5505">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5506">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5506">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5507">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5507">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5508">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5508">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5509">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5509">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5510">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5510">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5511">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5511">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5512">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5512">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5513">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5513">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5514">Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5514">Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5517">eindeutigeid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5517">eindeutigeid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5518">id personnelle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5518">id personnelle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5519">idpersonnelle #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5519">idpersonnelle#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5520">idpersonnelle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5520">idpersonnelle</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5521">개별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5521">individual code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5522">개별 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5522">individual id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5523">개별 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5523">individual identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5524">개별 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5524">individual identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5525">numéro d'identification 담당자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5525">numéro d'identification personnel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5526">개인 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5526">personal id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5527">개인 식별</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5527">personal identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5528">개인 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5528">personal identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5529">personalidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5529">personalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5530">personalidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5530">personalidnumber#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5532">고유 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5532">unique id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5533">고유 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5533">unique identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5534">uniqueidkey #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5534">uniqueidkey#</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5535">룩셈부르크 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5535">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5536">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5536">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5537">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5537">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5538">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5538">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5539">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5539">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5540">8 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5540">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5541">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5541">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5542">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5542">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5543">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5543">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5544">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5544">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5545">정규식이 해당  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5545">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5546">From 키워드를  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5546">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5547">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5547">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_nation_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5548">Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5548">Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5549">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5549">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5550">라트비아어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5550">latvian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5551">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5551">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5552">passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5552">passnummer</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5553">룩셈부르크 국내 식별 번호 (비 자연적인 사람)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5553">Luxemburg national identification number (non natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5554">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5554">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5555">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5555">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5556">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5556">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5557">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5557">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5558">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5558">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5559">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5559">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5560">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5560">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5561">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5561">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5562">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5562">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5563">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5563">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5564">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5564">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5565">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5565">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5566">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5566">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5567">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5567">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5568">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5568">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5569">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5569">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5570">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5570">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5571">From 키워드를  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5571">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5572">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5572">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5573">이 함수는 해당  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5573">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5586">sozialversécherung</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5586">sozialversécherung</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5587">sozialversicherungsausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5587">sozialversicherungsausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5588">steier id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5588">steier id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5590">steier nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5590">steier nummer</span></span>
