## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5613">말레이시아 식별 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5613">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5614">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5614">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5615">선택적으로 하이픈을 포함하는 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5615">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5616">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5616">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5617">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5617">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5618">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5618">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5619">대시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5619">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5620">두 글자로 된 생년월일 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5620">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5621">대시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5621">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5622">임의의 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5622">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5623">1 자리 성별 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5623">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5624">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5624">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5625">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5625">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5626">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5626">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5627">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5627">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5628">정규식 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5628">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5629">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5629">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5656">몰타 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5656">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5657">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5657">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5658">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5658">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5659">지정 된 패턴에서 두 개의 문자와 6 자리 숫자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5659">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5660">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5660">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5661">두 문자와 6 자리 숫자의 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5661">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5662">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5662">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5663">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5663">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5664">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5664">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5665">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5665">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5666">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5666">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5667">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5667">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5668">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5668">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5669">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5669">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5670">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5670">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5671">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5671">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5672">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5672">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
 <Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5682">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5682">driver's license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5684">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5684">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5685">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5685">driving license number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5687">liċenzja tas-sewqan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5687">liċenzja tas-sewqan</span></span>

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5688">몰타 id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5688">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5689">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5689">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5690">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5690">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5691">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5691">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5692">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5692">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5693">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5693">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5694">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5694">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5695">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5696">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5696">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5697">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5698">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5698">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5699">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5699">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5700">"M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z"의 한 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5700">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5701">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5702">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5702">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5703">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5704">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5704">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5705">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5705">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5706">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5706">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5707">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5707">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5708">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5708">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5717">numru ta ' uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5717">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5718">numru ta ' uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5718">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5725">몰타 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5725">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5726">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5726">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5727">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5727">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5728">공백이 나 구분 기호 없이 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5728">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5729">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5729">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5730">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5730">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5731">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5731">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5732">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5732">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5733">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5733">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5734">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5734">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5735">정규식이 해당  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5735">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5736">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5736">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5737">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5737">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5738">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5738">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5739">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5739">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5740">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5740">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5741">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5741">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5742">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5742">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5743">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5743">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5744">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5744">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5745">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5745">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5746">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5746">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5747">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5747">passportnumbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5749">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5749">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5750">numru-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5750">numru tal-passaport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5751">numri tal-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5751">numri tal-passaport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5752">Nru-passaport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5752">Nru tal-passaport</span></span>

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5753">몰타 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5753">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5754">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5754">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5755">몰타어 nationals의 경우:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5755">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5756">지정 된 패턴에서 일곱 자리 숫자와 한 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5756">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5757">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5757">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5758">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5758">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5759">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5759">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5760">몰타어 nationals: 7 자리 숫자와 1 개 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5760">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5761">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5761">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5762">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5762">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5763">몰타어 이외의 nationals 및 몰타어 엔터티: 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5763">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5764">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5764">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5765">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5765">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5766">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5766">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5767">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5767">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5768">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5768">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5769">Regex로  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  가져오거나 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5769">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5770">From 키워드를  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5770">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5771">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5771">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5772">Regex로  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 가져오거나 해당 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5772">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5778">kodiċi numerali personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5778">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5805">네덜란드 시민 서비스 (BSN) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5805">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5806">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5806">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5807">선택 공백이 포함 된 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5807">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5808">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5808">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5809">8-9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5809">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5810">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5810">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5811">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5811">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5812">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5812">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5813">공백 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5813">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5814">2-3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5814">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5815">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5815">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5816">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5816">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5817">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5817">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5818">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5818">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5819">Func_netherlands_bsn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5819">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5820">Keyword_netherlands_bsn에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5820">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5821">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5821">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5822">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5822">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5823">Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5823">Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5845">네덜란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5845">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5846">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5846">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5847">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5847">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5848">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5848">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5849">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5849">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5850">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5850">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5851">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5851">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5852">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5852">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5853">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5853">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5854">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5854">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5855">정규식이 해당  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5855">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5856">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5856">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5866">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5866">driver's license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5868">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5868">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5869">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5869">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5874">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5874">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5875">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5875">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5876">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5876">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5877">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5877">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5878">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5878">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5879">9 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5879">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5880">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5880">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5881">해당 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5881">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5882">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5882">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5883">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5883">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5884">정규식이 해당  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5884">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5885">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5885">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5886">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5886">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5887">Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5887">Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5888">네덜란드어 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5888">dutch passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5889">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5889">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5890">네덜란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5890">netherlands passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5891">nederlanden, nummer ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5891">nederlanden paspoort nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5892">고 대/ort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5892">paspoort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5893">nederlanden paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5893">nederlanden paspoortnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5894">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5894">paspoortnummer</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5895">네덜란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5895">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5896">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5896">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5897">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5897">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5898">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5898">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5899">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5899">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5900">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5900">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5901">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5901">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5902">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5902">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5903">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5903">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5904">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5904">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5905">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5905">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5906">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5906">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5907">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5907">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5908">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5908">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5909">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5909">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5910">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5910">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5911">From 키워드를  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5911">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5912">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5912">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5913">이 함수는 해당  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5913">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5914">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5914">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5915">Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5915">Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5951">네덜란드 값 추가 된 세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5951">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5952">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5952">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5953">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5953">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5954">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5954">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5955">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5955">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5956">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5956">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5957">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5957">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5958">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5958">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5959">14 문자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5959">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5960">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5960">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5961">14 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5961">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5962">N 또는 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5962">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5963">L 또는 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5963">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5964">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5964">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5965">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5965">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5966">선택적 공백, 점 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5966">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5967">B 또는 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5967">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5968">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5968">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5969">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5969">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5970">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5970">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5971">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5971">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5972">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5972">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5973">Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5973">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5974">Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5974">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5975">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5975">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5976">Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5976">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5977">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5977">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5978">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5978">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5979">vat 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5979">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5980">vat 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5980">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5981">vat #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5981">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5982">wearde tafoege 세금 getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5982">wearde tafoege tax getal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5983">btw nûmer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5983">btw nûmer</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5985">뉴질랜드 계좌 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5985">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5986">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5986">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5987">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5987">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5988">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5988">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5989">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5989">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5990">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5990">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5991">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5991">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5992">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5992">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5993">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 14-16 자리 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5993">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5994">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5994">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5995">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 14 ~ 16 자리 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5995">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5996">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5996">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5997">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5997">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5998">3 ~ 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5998">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-5999">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-5999">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6000">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6000">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6001">선택적 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6001">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6002">2 ~ 3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6002">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6003">옵션 하이픈 또는 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6003">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6004">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6004">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6005">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6005">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6006">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6006">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6007">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6007">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6008">Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6008">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6009">Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6009">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6010">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6010">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6011">Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6011">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6012">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6012">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6013">Keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6013">Keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6014">계정 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6014">account number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6015">은행 계좌</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6015">bank account</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6019">새 뉴질랜드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6019">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6020">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6020">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6021">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6021">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6022">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6022">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6023">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6023">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6024">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6024">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6025">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6025">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6026">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6026">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6027">8 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6027">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6028">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6028">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6029">8 자리 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6029">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6033">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6033">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6034">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6034">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6035">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6035">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6036">Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6036">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6037">Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6037">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6038">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6038">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6039">Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6039">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6113">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6113">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6116">선택적 구분 기호가 있는 8 개 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6116">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6124">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6124">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6125">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6125">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6126">Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6126">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6127">Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6127">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6128">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6128">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6129">Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6129">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6138">뉴질랜드 보건부 (생명 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6138">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6139">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6139">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6140">3 개의 문자, 공백 (선택 사항) 및 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6140">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6141">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6141">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6142">3 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 공백 (선택 사항) 4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6142">three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6143">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6143">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6144">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6144">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6145">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6145">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6146">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6146">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6147">Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6147">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6148">Keyword_nz_terms의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6148">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6149">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6149">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6150">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6150">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_nz_terms"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6151">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6151">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6154">상태</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6154">Health</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6155">처리가</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6155">treatment</span></span> 


## <a name="new-zealand-social-wlefare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6156">뉴질랜드 공유 wlefare 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6156">New Zealand social wlefare number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6157">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6157">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6158">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6158">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6159">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6159">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6160">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6160">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6161">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6161">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6162">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6162">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6163">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6164">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6164">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6165">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6166">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6166">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6167">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6167">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6168">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6168">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6169">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6169">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6170">선택적 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6170">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6171">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6171">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6172">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6173">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6173">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6174">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6175">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6175">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6176">Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6176">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6177">Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6177">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6178">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6178">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6179">Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6179">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6180">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6180">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6181">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6181">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6182">소셜 welfare #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6182">social welfare #</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6185">소셜 welfare 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6185">social welfare number</span></span>

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6187">노르웨이 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6187">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6188">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6188">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6189">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6189">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6190">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6190">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6191">11자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6191">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6192">출생 날짜에 해당 하는 DDMMYY 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6192">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6193">3 자리 개별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6193">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6194">두 개의 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6194">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6195">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6195">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6196">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6196">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6197">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6197">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6198">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6198">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6199">Func_norway_id_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6199">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6200">Keyword_norway_id_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6200">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6201">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6201">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6202">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6202">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6203">Func_norway_id_numbe 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6203">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6204">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6204">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6207">Personal identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6207">Personal identification number</span></span>
