- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6209">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6209">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6210">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6210">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6211">Personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6211">Personnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6212">Fødselsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6212">Fødselsnummer</span></span>

   
## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6213">필리핀 통합 다목적 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6213">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6214">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6214">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6215">하이픈으로 구분된 12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6215">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6216">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6216">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6217">12자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6217">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6218">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6218">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6219">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6219">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6220">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6220">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6221">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6221">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6222">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6222">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6223">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6223">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6224">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6224">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6225">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6225">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6226">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6226">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6227">정규식 Regex_philippines_unified_id 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6227">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6228">Keyword_philippines_id에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6228">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6229">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6229">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6230">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6230">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6231">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6231">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6232">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6232">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6233">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6233">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6234">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6234">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6235">폴란드 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6235">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6236">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6236">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6237">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6237">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6238">두 개의 슬래시를 포함 하는 14 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6238">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6239">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6239">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6240">14 자리 숫자와 2 개의 슬래시:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6240">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6241">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6241">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6242">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6242">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6243">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6243">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6244">슬래시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6244">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6245">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6245">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6246">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6246">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6247">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6247">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6248">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6248">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6249">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6249">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6250">정규식이 해당  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6250">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6251">From 키워드를  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6251">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6252">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6252">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_poland_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6253">Keywords_poland_eu_driver ' s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6253">Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6254">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6254">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6255">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6255">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6256">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6256">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6257">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6257">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6258">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6258">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6259">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6259">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6260">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6260">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6261">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6261">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6262">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6262">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6263">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6263">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6264">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6264">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6265">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6265">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6266">prawo jazdy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6266">prawo jazdy</span></span>

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6267">폴란드 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6267">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6268">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6268">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6269">3 개의 문자 및 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6269">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6270">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6270">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6271">3 개의 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6271">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6272">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6272">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6273">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6273">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6274">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6274">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6275">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6275">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6276">Func_polish_national_id 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6276">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6277">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6277">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6278">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6278">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6279">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6279">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6280">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6280">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6281">Dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6281">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6282">U r i dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6282">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6283">Nazwa i u r i dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6283">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6284">Nazwa i veiligheid dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6284">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6285">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6285">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6286">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6286">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6287">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6287">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6288">르.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6288">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6289">폴란드 국가 ID (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6289">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6290">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6290">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6291">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6291">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6292">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6292">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6293">YYMMDD 형식의 출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6293">6 digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6294">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6294">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6295">1 개 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6295">1 check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6296">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6296">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6297">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6297">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6298">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6298">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6299">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6299">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6300">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6300">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6301">Keyword_pesel_identification_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6301">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6302">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6302">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6303">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6303">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6304">Func_pesel_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6304">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6305">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6305">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6306">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6306">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6317">폴란드 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6317">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6318">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU Passport 번호 중요 한 정보 형식에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6318">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6319">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6319">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6320">2 개의 문자와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6320">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6321">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6321">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6322">2개의 문자(대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6322">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6323">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6323">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6324">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6324">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6325">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6325">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6326">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6326">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6327">Func_polish_passport_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6327">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6328">Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6328">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6329">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6329">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6330">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6330">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6331">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6331">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6332">U r i (zportu)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6332">Numer paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6333">Veiligheid.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6333">Nr.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6334">고 zportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6334">Paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6335">고 zport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6335">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6336">폴란드 REGON 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6336">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6337">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6337">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6338">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6338">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6339">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6339">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6340">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6340">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6341">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6341">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6342">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6342">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6343">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6343">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6344">9 자리 또는 14 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6344">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6345">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6345">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6346">9 자리 숫자 또는 14 자리 번호:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6346">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6347">9 자리 숫자 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6347">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6348">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6348">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6349">슬래시나</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6349">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6350">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6350">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6351">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6351">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6352">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6352">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6353">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6353">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6354">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6354">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6355">Func_polish_regon_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6355">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6356">Keywords_polish_regon_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6356">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6357">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6357">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6358">Func_polish_regon_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6358">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6375">폴란드 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6375">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6376">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6376">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6377">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6377">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6378">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6378">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6379">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6379">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6380">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6380">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6381">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6381">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6382">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6382">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6383">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 11 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6383">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6384">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6384">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6385">11자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6385">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6386">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6386">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6387">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6387">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6388">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6388">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6389">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6389">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6390">이 함수는 해당  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6390">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6391">From 키워드를  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6391">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6392">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6392">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6393">Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6393">Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6394">nip #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6394">nip#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6395">nip</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6395">nip</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6397">numeridentyfikacjipodatkowej #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6397">numeridentyfikacjipodatkowej#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6398">tax id
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6398">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6399">세금 식별 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6399">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6400">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6400">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6401">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6401">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6402">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6402">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6403">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6403">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6404">세금 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6404">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6405">taxid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6405">taxid#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6413">언급 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6413">tin#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6414">vat id #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6414">vat id#</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6421">포르투갈 시민 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6421">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6422">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6422">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6423">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6423">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6424">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6424">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6425">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6425">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6426">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6426">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6427">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6427">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6428">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6428">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6429">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6429">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6430">정규식 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6430">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6431">Keyword_portugal_citizen_card에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6431">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6432">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6432">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6437">문서 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6437">document number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6438">documento de identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6438">documento de identificação</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6439">id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6439">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6440">id 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6440">identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6441">identification number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6441">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6442">id 카드 번호 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6442">identity card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6443">id 카드 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6443">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6444">국가 id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6444">national id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6445">nic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6445">nic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6446">número bi de 포르투갈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6446">número bi de portugal</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6448">número de identificação 회계</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6448">número de identificação fiscal</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6451">포르투갈 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6451">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6452">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6452">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6453">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6453">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6454">두 개의 문자와 지정 된 패턴에 있는 일곱 개의 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6454">two letters followed by a seven numbers in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6455">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6455">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6456">두 문자 다음에 특수 문자를 사용한 7 개의 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6456">two letters followed by seven numbers with special characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6457">2 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6457">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6458">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6458">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6459">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6459">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6460">공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6460">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6461">1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6461">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6462">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6462">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6463">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6463">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6464">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6464">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6465">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6465">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6466">정규식이 해당  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6466">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6467">From 키워드를  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6467">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6472">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6472">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6473">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6473">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6474">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6474">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6475">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6475">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6476">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6476">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6477">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6477">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6478">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6478">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6479">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6479">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6480">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6480">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6481">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6481">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6482">carteira de motorista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6482">carteira de motorista</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6483">포르투갈 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6483">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6484">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6484">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6485">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6485">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6486">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6486">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6487">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6487">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6488">1 개의 문자 다음에 6 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6488">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6489">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6489">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6490">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6490">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6491">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6491">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6492">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6492">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6493">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6493">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6494">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6494">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6495">정규식이 해당  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6495">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6496">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6496">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6497">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6497">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6498">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6498">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6499">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6499">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6500">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6500">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6501">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6501">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6502">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6502">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6503">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6503">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6504">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6504">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6505">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6505">passportnumber</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6520">포르투갈 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6520">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6521">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6521">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6522">선택 공백이 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6522">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6523">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6523">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6524">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6524">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6525">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6525">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6526">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6526">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6527">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6527">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6528">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6528">3 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6529">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6530">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6530">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6531">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6532">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6532">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6533">이 함수는 해당  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6533">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6534">From 키워드를  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6534">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6535">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6535">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6536">이 함수는 해당  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6536">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6547">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6547">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6548">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6548">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6549">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6549">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6550">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6550">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6551">세금 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6551">tax registration number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6553">taxidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6553">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6554">taxidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6554">taxidnumber#</span></span>

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6561">루마니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6561">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6562">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6562">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6563">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6563">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6564">한 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6564">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6565">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6565">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6566">1 개의 문자 다음에 8 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6566">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6567">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6567">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6568">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6568">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6569">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6569">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6570">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6570">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6571">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6571">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6572">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6572">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6573">정규식이 해당  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6573">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6574">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6574">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6575">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6575">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6577">dl #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6577">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6578">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6578">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6579">드라이버 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6579">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6580">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6580">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6581">drivers lic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6581">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6582">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6582">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6583">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6583">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6584">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6584">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6585">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6585">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6586">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6586">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6587">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6587">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6588">dlno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6588">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6589">permis de conducere</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6589">permis de conducere</span></span>

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6590">루마니아 p (personal numeric code)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6590">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6591">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6591">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6592">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6592">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6593">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6593">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6594">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6594">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6595">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6595">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6596">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6596">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6597">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6597">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6598">공백과 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6598">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6599">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6599">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6600">1 자리 1-9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6600">1 digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6601">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자 (YYMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6601">6 digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6602">2 자리 숫자 (01-52 또는 99 일 수 있음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6602">2 digits which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6603">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6603">4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6604">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6604">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6605">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6605">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6606">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6606">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6607">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6607">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6608">이 함수는 해당  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6608">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6609">From 키워드를  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6609">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6610">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6610">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6611">이 함수는 해당  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6611">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6662">루마니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6662">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6663">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6663">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6664">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6665">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6665">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6666">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6667">8 또는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6667">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6668">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6669">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6669">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6670">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6671">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6671">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6672">정규식이 해당  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6672">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6673">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6673">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6687">numărul pașaportului numarul pasaportului numerele pașaportului Pașaport veiligheid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6687">numărul pașaportului numarul pasaportului numerele pașaportului Pașaport nr</span></span>

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6688">러시아 (국내) 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6688">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6689">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6689">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6690">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6690">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6691">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6691">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6692">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6692">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6693">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6693">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6694">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6694">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6695">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6696">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6696">ten digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6697">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6698">10 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6698">ten digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6699">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6699">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6700">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6700">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6701">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6701">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6702">선택적 공백</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6702">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6703">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6703">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6704">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6704">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6705">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6705">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6706">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6706">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6707">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6707">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6708">Regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6708">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6709">Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6709">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6714">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6714">passport #</span></span>

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6726">러시아 (국제) 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6726">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6727">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6727">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6728">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6728">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6729">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6729">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6730">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6730">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6731">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6731">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6732">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6732">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6733">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6733">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6734">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6734">nine digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6735">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6735">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6736">9 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6736">nine digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6737">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6737">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6738">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6738">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6739">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6739">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6740">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6740">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6741">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6741">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6742">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6742">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6743">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6743">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6744">Regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6744">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6745">Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6745">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6752">passportno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6752">passportno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6755">паспорт id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6755">паспорт id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6757">pусский номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6757">pусский номер паспорта</span></span>

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6762">사우디 아라비아 국가 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6762">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6763">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6763">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6764">10 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6764">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6765">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6765">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6766">10 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6766">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6767">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6767">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6768">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6768">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6769">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6769">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6770">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6770">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6771">Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 정규식이 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6771">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6772">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6772">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6773">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6773">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6774">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6774">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6775">Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6775">Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6776">I card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6776">I card number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6777">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6777">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6778">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6778">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6779">싱가포르 NRIC (국가 등록 id 카드) 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6779">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6780">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6781">9 개의 문자 및 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6781">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6782">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6782">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6783">9 개의 문자 및 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6783">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6784">문자 "F", "G", "S" 또는 "T" (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6784">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6785">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6785">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6786">알파벳 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6786">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6787">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6787">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6788">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6788">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6789">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6789">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6790">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6790">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6791">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6791">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6792">Keyword_singapore_nric에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6792">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6793">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6793">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6794">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6794">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6795">정규식 Regex_singapore_nric 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6795">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6796">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6796">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6797">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6797">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_singapore_nric"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6798">Keyword_singapore_nric</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6798">Keyword_singapore_nric</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6799">National Registration Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6799">National Registration Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6800">Identity Card Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6800">Identity Card Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6801">NRIC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6801">NRIC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6802">비용</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6802">IC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6803">Foreign Identification Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6803">Foreign Identification Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6804">삭제할</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6804">FIN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6805">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6805">身份证</span></span>
