## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6807">슬로바키아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6807">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6808">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6808">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6809">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6809">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6810">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6810">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6811">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6811">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6812">한 문자 다음에 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6812">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6813">1 개 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함) 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6813">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6814">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6814">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6815">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6815">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6816">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6816">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6817">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6817">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6818">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6818">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6819">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6819">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6820">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6820">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovaknia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6836">슬로바키아 개인 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6836">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6837">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6837">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6838">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6838">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6839">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6839">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6840">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6840">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6841">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6841">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6842">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6842">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6843">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6843">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6844">선택적 백슬래시를 포함 하는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6844">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6845">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6845">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6846">출생 날짜를 나타내는 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6846">6 digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6847">선택적 슬래시 (/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6847">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6848">3 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6848">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6849">1 개의 선택적 검사 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6849">1 optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6850">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6850">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6851">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6851">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6852">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6852">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6853">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6853">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6854">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6854">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6855">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6855">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6856">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6856">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6857">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6857">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6904">슬로바키아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6904">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6905">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6905">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6906">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6906">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6907">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 한 자리 숫자 또는 문자 다음에 일곱 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6907">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6908">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6908">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6909">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)와 7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6909">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6910">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6910">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6911">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6911">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6912">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6912">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6913">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6913">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6914">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6914">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6915">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6915">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6934">슬로베니아 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6934">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6935">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6935">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6936">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6936">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6937">공백과 구분 기호를 사용 하지 않고 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6937">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6938">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6938">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6939">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6939">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6940">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6940">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6941">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6941">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6942">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6942">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6943">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6943">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6944">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6944">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6945">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6945">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6951">드라이버 라이선스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6951">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6957">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6957">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6958">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6958">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6961">슬로베니아 고유 마스터 시민 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6961">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6962">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6962">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6963">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6963">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6964">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6964">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6965">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6965">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6966">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6966">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6967">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6967">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6968">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6968">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6969">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 13 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6969">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6970">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6970">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6971">지정 된 패턴의 13 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6971">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6972">생년월일 (DDMMLLL)에 해당 하는 7 자리 숫자 이며 "LLL"은 출생 연도의 마지막 세 자리에 해당 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6972">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6973">출생 "50" 영역에 해당 하는 2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6973">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6974">같은 날에 태어난 사용자의 성별 및 일련 번호 조합에 해당 하는 3 자리 숫자 (남성는 000-499, 암은 500-999)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6974">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6975">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6975">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6976">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6976">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6977">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6977">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6978">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6978">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6979">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6979">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6980">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6980">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6981">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6981">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6982">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6982">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6983">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6983">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6984">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6984">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6985">Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6985">Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6986">ed명령이 vena številka glavnega državljana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6986">edinstvena številka glavnega državljana</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6987">emšo</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6987">emšo</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6988">enotna maticna številka obcana</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6988">enotna maticna številka obcana</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6989">id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6989">id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6990">identification number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6990">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6991">identifikacijska številka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6991">identifikacijska številka</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6992">id 카드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6992">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6993">nac사서함 alna id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6993">nacionalna id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6994">nacpotni alni 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-6994">nacionalni potni list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-6995">

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7011">슬로베니아 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7011">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7012">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7012">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7013">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7013">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7014">공백 또는 구분 기호가 없는 7 자리, 두 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7014">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7015">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7015">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7016">2 개 문자와 7 자리 숫자를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7016">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7017">"P" 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7017">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7018">대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7018">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7019">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7019">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7020">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7020">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7021">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7021">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7022">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7022">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7023">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7023">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7024">정규식이 해당  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7024">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7025">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7025">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7030">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7030">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7031">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7031">passports</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7035">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7035">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7036">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7036">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7037">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7037">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7038">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7038">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7039">številka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7039">številka potnega lista</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7040">potek veljavnosti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7040">potek veljavnosti</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7042">datum rojstva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7042">datum rojstva</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7043">potni 목록</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7043">potni list</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7044">številke potnih listov</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7044">številke potnih listov</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7045">슬로베니아 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7045">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7046">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7046">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7047">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7047">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7048">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7048">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7049">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7049">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7050">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7050">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7051">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7051">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7052">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7052">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7053">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7053">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7054">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7054">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7055">1-9의 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7055">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7056">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7056">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7057">검사 숫자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7057">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7058">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7058">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7059">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7059">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7060">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7060">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7061">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7061">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7062">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7062">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7063">From 키워드를  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7063">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7064">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7064">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7065">이 함수는 해당  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7065">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7067">Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7067">Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7069">identifikacijska številka davka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7069">identifikacijska številka davka</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7073">tax id

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7075">세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7075">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7076">세금 없음 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7076">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7077">세금 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7077">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7078">세금 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7078">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7079">세금 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7079">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7080">taxid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7080">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7081">taxidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7081">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7082">taxidnumber #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7082">taxidnumber#</span></span>

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7089">남아프리카 공화국 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7089">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7090">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7090">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7091">공백을 포함할 수 있는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7091">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7092">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7092">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7093">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7093">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7094">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7094">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7095">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7095">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7096">1 자리 참여 지표</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7096">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7097">숫자 "8" 또는 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7097">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7098">체크섬 숫자에 해당 하는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7098">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7099">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7099">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7100">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7100">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7101">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7101">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7102">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7102">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7103">Func_south_africa_identification_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7103">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7104">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7104">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7105">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7105">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7106">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7106">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7107">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7107">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7108">Identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7108">Identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7109">ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7109">ID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7110">확인과</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7110">Identification</span></span> 
   
## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7111">대한민국 등록 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7111">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7112">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7112">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7113">하이픈을 포함하는 13자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7113">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7114">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7114">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7115">13자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7115">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7116">생년월일에 해당 하는 YYMMDD 형식의 6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7116">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7117">하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7117">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7118">세기 및 성별에 따라 결정 되는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7118">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7119">4 자리 출생 지역 코드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7119">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7120">이전 번호가 동일한 사람을 구분 하는 데 사용 되는 1 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7120">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7121">검사 숫자입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7121">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7122">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7122">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7123">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7123">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7124">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7124">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7125">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7125">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7126">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7126">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7127">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7127">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7128">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7128">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7129">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7129">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7130">Func_south_korea_resident_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7130">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7131">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7131">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7132">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7132">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7133">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7133">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7134">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7134">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7135">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7135">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7136">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7136">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7137">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7137">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7138">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7138">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7139">스페인 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7139">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7140">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 드라이버의 라이선스 번호 중요 정보 유형 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7140">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7141">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7141">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7142">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7142">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7143">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7143">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7144">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7144">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7145">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7145">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7146">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7146">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7147">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7147">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7148">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7148">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7149">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7149">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7150">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7150">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7151">이 함수는 해당  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7151">The function  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7152">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7152">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7168">영향 요소 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7168">drivers licence number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7170">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7170">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7171">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7171">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7172">운전 라이선스 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7172">driving licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7173">운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7173">driving license number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7175">제어 허용 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7175">driving permit number</span></span>

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7189">스페인 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7189">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7190">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7190">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7191">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7191">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7192">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7192">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7193">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7193">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7194">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7194">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7195">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7195">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7196">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7196">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7197">8 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7197">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7198">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7198">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7199">7 자리 숫자와 문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7199">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7200">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7200">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7201">선택적 공백 또는 하이픈</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7201">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7202">1 개의 확인 문자 (대/소문자 구분 안 함)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7202">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7203">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7203">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7204">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7204">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7205">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7205">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7206">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7206">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7207">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7207">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7208">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7208">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7209">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7209">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7210">해당  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7210">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7211">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7211">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7213">carné de identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7213">carné de identidad</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7216">dninúmero #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7216">dninúmero#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7220">보험 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7220">insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7221">국가 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7221">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7222">국가 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7222">national identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7223">nationalid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7223">nationalid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7224">nationalidno #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7224">nationalidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7225">nie #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7225">nie#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7226">nie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7226">nie</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7227">nienúmero #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7227">nienúmero#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7228">número de identificación</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7228">número de identificación</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7229">número nacional identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7229">número nacional identidad</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7230">개인 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7230">personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7231">개인 id 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7231">personal identity no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7232">고유 id 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7232">unique identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7233">uniqueid #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7233">uniqueid#</span></span>

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7234">스페인 여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7234">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7235">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU (유럽 여권 번호) 중요 한 정보 유형 으로만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7235">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7236">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7236">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7237">공백이 나 구분 기호가 없는 문자 및 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7237">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7238">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7238">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7239">문자와 숫자의 8 자리 또는 9 자리 조합:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7239">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7240">두 자리 숫자 또는 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7240">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7241">1 자리 숫자 또는 문자 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7241">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7242">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7242">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7243">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7243">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7244">해당 사항 없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7244">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7245">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7245">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7246">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7246">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7247">정규식이 해당  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7247">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7248">From  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 또는 found의 키워드 `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7248">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7249">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7249">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7250">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7250">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7251">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7251">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7252">여권 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7252">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7253">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7253">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7254">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7254">passports</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7255">passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7255">passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7256">passport 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7256">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7257">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7257">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7258">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7258">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7259">passportnumbers</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7259">passportnumbers</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7260">여권 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7260">passport numbers</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7261">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7261">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7262">pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7262">libreta pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7263">número pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7263">número pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7264">españa pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7264">españa pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7265">números de pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7265">números de pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7266">número de pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7266">número de pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7267">números pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7267">números pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7268">pasaporte 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7268">pasaporte no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7269">포트 n °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7269">Passeport n°</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7270">n °에이 포트</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7270">n° Passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7271">pasaporte 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7271">pasaporte no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7272">pasaporte n °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7272">pasaporte n°</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7273">스페인 여권</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7273">spain passport</span></span>


## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7274">스페인 SSN (사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7274">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7275">이 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 주민 등록 번호 또는 동등한 ID 중요 정보 유형에 포함 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7275">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7276">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7276">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7277">11-12자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7277">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7278">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7278">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7279">11-12 자리 숫자:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7279">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7280">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7280">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7281">슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7281">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7282">7 ~ 8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7282">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7283">슬래시 (선택 사항)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7283">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7284">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7284">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7285">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7285">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7286">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7286">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7287">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7287">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7288">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7288">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7289">Func_spanish_social_security_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7289">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7290">체크섬이 통과됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7290">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7291">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7291">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7292">없음</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7292">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7293">스페인 세금 식별 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7293">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7294">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7294">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7295">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7295">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7296">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7296">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7297">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7297">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7298">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7298">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7299">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7299">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7300">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7300">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7301">지정 된 패턴에 7 ~ 8 자리 숫자와 한 가지 또는 두 개의 문자가 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7301">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7302">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7302">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7303">스페인 국내 Id 카드가 있는 스페인어 (자연 사용자):</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7303">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7304">8 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7304">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7305">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7305">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7306">스페인 국가 Id 카드가 없는 상주 하지 않는 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7306">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7307">1 개의 대문자 "L" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7307">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7308">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7308">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7309">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7309">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7310">스페인 국가 Id 카드를 사용 하지 않고 14 년 동안 상주 하는 Spaniards:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7310">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7311">1 개의 대문자 "K" (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7311">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7312">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7312">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7313">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7313">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7314">Foreigner의 식별 번호를 사용 하는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7314">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7315">"X", "Y" 또는 "Z" (대/소문자 구분)의 대문자 1 개</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7315">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7316">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7316">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7317">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7317">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7318">Foreigner의 Id 번호가 없는 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7318">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7319">"M"을 나타내는 대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7319">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7320">7 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7320">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7321">대문자 1 개 (대/소문자 구분)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7321">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7322">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7322">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7323">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7323">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7324">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7324">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7325">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7325">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7326">해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7326">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7327">From 키워드를  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 찾았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7327">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7328">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7328">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7329">해당  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7329">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7360">SQL Server 연결 문자열</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7360">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7361">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7361">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7362">아래 패턴에 설명 된 문자 및 문자열이 뒤에 오는 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7362">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7363">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7363">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7364">문자열 "User Id", "User ID", "uid" 또는 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7364">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7365">1-200에서 대/소문자, 숫자, 기호, 특수 문자 또는 공백 사이의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7365">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7366">문자열 "Password" 또는 "pwd" (여기에서 "pwd" 앞에 소문자 문자가 오지 않음)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7366">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7367">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7367">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7368">달러 기호 ($), 백분율 기호 (%, 부등호 (>), 기호 (@), 따옴표 ("), 세미콜론 (;), 왼쪽 중괄호 ([) 또는 왼쪽 대괄호 ({))가 아닌 모든 문자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7368">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7369">세미콜론 (;), 슬래시 (/) 또는 따옴표 (")가 아닌 7-128 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7369">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7370">세미콜론 (;) 또는 따옴표 (")</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7370">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7371">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7371">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7372">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7372">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7373">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7373">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7374">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7374">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7375">정규식 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7375">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7376">CEP_GlobalFilter의 키워드를 찾을 수 **없습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7376">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7377">정규식 CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7377">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7378">정규식 CEP_CommonExampleKeywords에서 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠 **를 찾지 않습니다** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7378">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7379">키워드</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7379">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7380">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7380">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7381">일부 암호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7381">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7382">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7382">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7383">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7383">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7384">예</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7384">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7385">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7385">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7386">기술적으로이 중요 한 정보 유형은 키워드 목록이 아니라 정규식을 사용 하 여 이러한 키워드를 식별 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7386">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7387">암호나 pwd에 0-2 공백, 등호 (=), 0-2 공백 및 별표 (\*)-----------------------</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7387">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7388">암호나 pwd 뒤에 다음이 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7388">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7389">등호 (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7389">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7390">보다 작음 기호 (<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7390">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7391">대문자나 소문자, digits, 별표 (\*), 하이픈 (-), 밑줄 (_) 또는 공백 문자인 1-200 문자의 조합</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7391">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7392">보다 큼 기호 (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7392">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7393">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7393">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7402">testacs입니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7402">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-7403">ccw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-7403">com</span></span>
