## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8043">미국 운전 면허 번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8043">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8044">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8044">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8045">주마다 다릅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8045">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8046">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8046">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8047">주 (예: 뉴욕)에 따라 다음을 수행 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8047">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8048">ddd ddd ddd와 같이 9 자리 숫자는 일치 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8048">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8049">ddddddddd와 같은 9 자리 숫자가 일치 하지 않습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8049">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8050">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8050">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8051">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8051">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8052">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8052">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8053">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8053">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8054">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8054">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8055">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8055">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8056">Keyword_us_drivers_license에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8056">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8057">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8057">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8058">Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8058">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8059">Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8059">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8060">Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8060">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8061">Keyword_us_drivers_license의 키워드가 발견되지 않았습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8061">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8159">미국 ITIN (개별 taxpayer 식별 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8159">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8160">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8160">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8161">"9"로 시작 하 고, "7" 또는 "8"을 네 번째 숫자로 포함 하 고, 필요에 따라 공백이 나 대시로 서식이 지정 된 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8161">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8162">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8162">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8163">서식이</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8163">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8164">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8164">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8165">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8165">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8166">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8166">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8167">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8167">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8168">숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8168">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8169">공백 또는 대시</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8169">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8170">4 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8170">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8171">서식</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8171">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8172">숫자 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8172">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8173">2 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8173">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8174">"7" 또는 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8174">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8175">5 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8175">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8176">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8176">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8177">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8177">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8178">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8178">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8179">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8179">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8180">Func_formatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8180">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8181">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8181">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8182">Keyword_itin의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8182">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8183">Func_us_address 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 주소를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8183">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8184">Func_us_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8184">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8185">Keyword_itin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8185">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8186">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8186">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8187">Func_unformatted_itin 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8187">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8188">다음 중 하나 이상이 충족됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8188">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8189">Keyword_itin_collaborative의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8189">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8190">Func_us_address 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 주소를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8190">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8191">Func_us_date 함수가 올바른 날짜 형식의 날짜를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8191">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
<Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8203">taxid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8203">taxid</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8204">individual taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8204">individual taxpayer</span></span> 

#### <a name="keyword_itin_collaborative"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8205">Keyword_itin_collaborative</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8205">Keyword_itin_collaborative</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8206">License</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8206">License</span></span>

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8212">미국 SSN (사회 보장 번호)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8212">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8213">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8213">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8214">서식이 지정 되거나 서식 없는 패턴으로 표시 될 수 있는 9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8214">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8215">Mid가 2011 이전에 실행 된 경우 SSN은 특정 범위 내에서 번호의 특정 부분이 유효한 지 확인 하는 강력한 서식을 사용 해야 하지만 검사 값은 없습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8215">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8216">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8216">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8217">다음의 네 가지 패턴에서 SSNs를 검색 하는 함수는 다음과 같습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8217">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8218">Func_ssn는 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정 된 2011 이전 수준의 서식으로 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddd-dd-dddd 또는 ddd dd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8218">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8219">Func_unformatted_ssn는 형식이 지정 되지 않은 2011 이전 형식으로 서식이 지정 된 SSNs를 찾고 (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8219">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8220">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn는 대시 또는 공백으로 서식이 지정 된 post-2011 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddd-dd-dddd 또는 ddd dd dddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8220">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8221">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn는 형식 없는 2011 SSNs를 찾습니다 (ddddddddd).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8221">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8222">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8222">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8223">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8223">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8224">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8224">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8225">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 85% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8225">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8226">Func_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8226">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8227">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8227">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8228">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8228">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8229">Func_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8229">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8230">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8230">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8231">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 65% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8231">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8232">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8232">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8233">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8233">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8234">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 55% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8234">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8235">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8235">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8236">Keyword_ssn의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8236">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8238">Keyword_ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8238">Keyword_ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8242">소셜 보안 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8242">social security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8243">소셜 보안 아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8243">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8244">Social Security#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8244">Social Security#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8246">SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8246">SSN</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8247">있는 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8247">SSNS</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8248">SSN #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8248">SSN#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8249">대비 #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8249">SS#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8250">생길</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8250">SSID</span></span>
   
## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8251">미국/영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8251">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8252">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8252">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8253">영국</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8253">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8254">passport 번호 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티는 EU 여권 번호 중요 한 정보 유형으로 제공 되며 독립 실행형 중요 한 정보 유형 엔터티로 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8254">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8255">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8255">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8256">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8256">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8257">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8257">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8258">9 자리 연속 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8258">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8259">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8259">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8260">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8260">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8261">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8261">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8262">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8262">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8263">Func_usa_uk_passport 함수가 해당 패턴과 일치하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8263">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8264">Keyword_passport의 키워드가 발견되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8264">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8285">우크라이나 passport 국내</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8285">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8286">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8286">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8287">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8287">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8289">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8289">information governance</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8292">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8292">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8293">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8293">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8294">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8294">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8295">9 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8295">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8296">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8296">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8297">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8297">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8298">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8298">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8299">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8299">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8300">Regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8300">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8301">Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8301">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8310">우크라이나 여권 국제 전화</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8310">Ukraine passport international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8311">이 중요 한 정보 유형은 다음 에서만 사용할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8311">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8312">데이터 손실 방지 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8312">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8313">통신 준수 정책</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8313">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8314">정보 거 버 넌 스</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8314">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8315">레코드 관리</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8315">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8316">Microsoft cloud app security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8316">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8317">형식일</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8317">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8318">8 자 영숫자 패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8318">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8319">패턴</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8319">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8320">8 자리 영숫자 패턴:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8320">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8321">두 개의 문자 또는 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8321">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8322">6 자리 숫자</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8322">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8323">제외</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8323">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8324">아니요</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8324">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8325">정의</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8325">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8326">DLP 정책은 다음과 같은 경우 이러한 유형의 중요한 정보가 300자 이내의 접근성으로 검색되었음을 75% 신뢰합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8326">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8327">Regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International는 해당 패턴과 일치 하는 콘텐츠를 찾습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8327">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efa3c-8328">Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International에서 키워드가 발견 되었습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efa3c-8328">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
